rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
rules.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
rules.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
rules.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

rules.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
rules.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

rules.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
rules.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

rules.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
rules.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

rules.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia (including targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called 'conversion therapy').
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

title: Mastodon
short_description: Generic Mastodon server for anyone to use.

contact_account.note:
This account will be used by the Mastodon.world admins to make announcements about the instance.

For any assistance, please e-mail us (info@mastodon.world), as we can’t read & reply-to all DM’s.

rules.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
A Content Warning must always be used when posting all other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No racism.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No posting of malicious links.
No Spam (see General Guidance below).
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No “shitposting” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” here.
No targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy".
Banner and Avatar images must comply with the other rules, so no NSFW images etc

rules.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity.  One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.  Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world.  Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.

No attacks against (or from) the instance.

You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of Infosec.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.
For more details see https://wiki.infosec.exchange/rules/start
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop

Automated posting:
- accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a “bot” in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors
- automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to “public”. There is no limit on “unlisted” posts.
Soliciting or inciting violence or harm against a person or segment of people is not permitted.

Piaille.fr est un serveur mastodon créé pour accueillir les personnes souhaitant profiter d'un réseau social décentralisé, amical, francophone. Il permet de discuter avec toutes celles et ceux qui, sur piaille ou sur d'autres services de la fédiverse, échangent des messages, photos, vidéos etc. 
La modération est active et transparente, visant à rendre ce lieu clair et sûr.

ATTENTION, ce compte n'est pas associé à une personne mais à l'équipe d'admin de Piaille, il n'est utilisé que pour les messages de maintenances, et ne répondra pas à vos questions. rules.text: Conformément aux lois françaises et à la jurisprudence, les contenus pédopornographiques, y compris sous forme dessinée, sont illégaux et seront supprimés, et les comptes concernés bloqués (si distants) ou supprimés (si local).
La nudité, les contenus érotiques, pornographiques ou visiblement violents doivent être marqués avec le drapeau "sensible / sensitive". Les comptes ne respectant pas cette règle seront supprimés

La publicité, sous forme répétée et/ou intrusive (faisant mention d'autres utilisateur·ices), n'est pas acceptée. Les comptes concernés seront rendus invisibles aux flux locaux et fédérés, ou supprimés, selon la gravité de la situation.
Approchez les personnes avec précaution et politesse. Si une personne vous demande d'arrêter de la mentionner ou qu'elle exprime ne plus vouloir participer à une discussion, arrêtez immédiatement.
Est interdit tout propos reproduisant des comportements oppressifs visibles dans la société ( par exemple : racisme, sexisme, lgbtphobie, validisme )
Sont interdits les avances ou propositions à caractères sexuels non-sollicitées.
Sont interdit toute conduite, en public ou en privé, ayant pour but de traquer, harceler ou intimider d'autres personnes.
Il est interdit de rassembler, publier, disséminer les informations personnelles d'une autre personne sans son autorisation explicite.

Il est interdit de poursuivre une conversation ou inciter une personne à poursuivre une interaction avec une personne ayant réclamé la cessation de ladite interaction. Cela peut être considéré comme du harcèlement, indépendamment de la confidentialité employée.
Est interdit toute tentative de retournement d’une oppression systémique. Par exemple : « racisme anti-blanc », « sexisme anti-homme », « hétérophobie », « cisphobie ».

Il est interdit de publier ou diffuser intentionnellement des propos diffamatoires, calomnieux, ainsi que toute désinformation avec intention de tromper (le gorafi ou the onion sont donc autorisés). Les profils satiriques doivent être indiqués comme tels dans leur nom et description publique.

Eure Daten werden nicht weiter verwertet. Die Server für troet.cafe stehen in einem Rechenzentrum in Deutschland. rules.text: Keine Belästigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen.
Rassismus, Sexismus oder Beschimpfungen haben hier nichts verloren.
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten haben hier auch nichts verloren.
Nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus ist verboten.
Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten sind verboten.
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt und/oder Gewaltdarstellungen in jeglicher Form sind nicht erlaubt.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden gelöscht.
Übermässige Werbung / Spam / Spamflut von wiederholenden Tröts sind nicht erwünscht.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Allgemeine Verstöße gegen geltendes Recht in Deutschland.
Gezieltes Misgendering, Deadnaming oder Werbung für sogenannte "Konversionstherapien" sind verboten.

Mir ist bewusst, dass ein Verstoß gegen eine der Serverregeln zur Löschung von einzelnen Beiträgen, oder der Stummschaltung/Löschung des gesamten Accounts führen kann und mit dem Anlegen eines Accounts akzeptiere ich alle Regeln.

title: Mastodon Uno Social - Italia
short_description:
Mastodon.Uno è la prima comunità generalista italiana.
Con oltre 73.000 iscritti è il più grande nodo Mastodon italiano. 
Anima ambientalista a supporto della privacy e del mondo Open Source.
description:
Mastodon.uno è il social network generalista Italiano parte della più grande rete internazionale di social interconnessi liberi ed open source: Il Fediverso, un neologismo composto dall'unione di due parole "federazione" e "universo". È un nome comune per i social network federati che funzionano con software libero aperto su più di 6000 server in tutto il mondo e che al momento supera i 4 milioni di iscritti. Storicamente, questo termine ha incluso solo le piattaforme di microblogging che supportavano un insieme di protocolli chiamati OStatus. Con la comparsa e l'ampia adozione di un nuovo protocollo standard chiamato ActivityPub si è creata un grande numero di nuovi progetti liberi che intendono dare un'alternativa ai social commerciali. I social network del Fediverso sono molto differenti rispetto alle piattaforme mainstream (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, ecc). In primo luogo, tutte le reti federate sono sviluppate da comunità di persone in tutto il mondo, indipendentemente da qualsiasi società o istituzione ufficiale. Questo significa che puoi partecipare allo sviluppo e alla crescita del Fediverse. Tutte le competenze sono preziose: diffondere la parola, invitare amici sono attività molto gradite. Un'altra differenza di questi social network dai silos aziendali è il principio della federazione. Le reti principali concentrano milioni di utenti sui loro server. Questo dà loro il pericoloso potere di controllare le informazioni e di accumulare i dati privati degli utenti, utilizzandoli a scopo di lucro commerciale (e chissà quali altr scopii). Le reti Fediverse sono progettate per essere gestite da chiunque: sei libero di scegliere e registrarti su qualsiasi server che ti piace, puoi scegliere la persona che si occuperà dei tuoi dati - l'amministratore del tuo server. Se hai una ottima conoscenza tecnica, puoi amministrare il tuo server per i tuoi amici e la tua famiglia, collegandoti a tuo piacimento con migliaia di altri server indipendenti attraverso il web. In un certo senso, Fediverse è un universo autonomo dove il potere e i dati sono decentralizzati e sparsi in più paesi, mentre i siti web aziendali tradizionali si sono fatti ciascuno un imperatore (o un tiranno?) del proprio enorme impero, circondati da alte recinzioni, e riservano a se stessi tutte le decisioni, il controllo dei dati e la censura. Mastodon.uno è interconnesso con tutte le reti federate ed è interoperabile con ognuna di loro fancente capo al "Fediverso" ed è la community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto segue rigidi criteri di affidabilità fra cui: ci sono più di un responsabile tecnico disponibile 24h in caso di problemi, garazie nel mantenere il sito attivo online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio. Mastodon.uno è inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui è attiva la ricerca sul testo, che è disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze in quanto richiede un'enorme potenza di calcolo.

Mastodon non ti obbliga a iscriverti con il tuo nome e cognome o con il tuo numero di telefono, puoi mantenere la tua privacy ed utilizzare qualsiasi nome, abbiamo solo bisogno di una email per la verifica. Oppure al contrario se desideri avere un account con una identità vericata/verificabile basta inserire un piccolo script che trovi nel tuo pannello di modifica del profilo all'interno della home del tuo sito. Oppure utilizzando l'app open source keybase per verificare la propria identità su più social: keybase su mastodon.uno, keybase è una piattaforma con cui si può confermare che diversi profili social facciano capo a sé (per intenderci confermi gli account che gestisci), in modo sicuro utilizzando la crittografia. I social commerciali come facebook e twitter negli ultimi anni si sono distinti per la capacità di disseminare disinformazione, teorie cospirazioniste e con lo scandalo Cambridge Analytica, la manipolazione dell'opinione pubblica. Inoltre le fake news, gli haters, la profilatura e la vendita dei dati personali a scopi commerciali. Questi ed altri sono i fenomeni problematici emersi solo negli ultimi anni attorno e dentro ai social network commerciali, Facebook in primis.
Facebook, Twitter eGoogle esistono vendendo i tuoi dati a terzi inserzionisti per sovvenzionare i servizi che ricevi gratuitamente, ma questo è molto negativo per la privacy degli utenti, perché le aziende sono incentivate ad abusare il più possibile della tua privacy. L'alternativa è il modello di Mastodon... abbiamo una certa percentuale di utenti che donano ed è questo che ci sostiene.
I social come facebook e twitter devono rispondere ai loro azionisti e aumentarne i profitti, usano gli algoritmi per creare la bolla di filtraggio: una gabbia rassicurante all’interno della quale, grazie all’intervento dei dati profilati di ogni utente, vediamo quasi esclusivamente contenuti che confermano quelle che già sono le nostre credenze.

Lungi dal mantenere la promessa originaria del web, ovvero offrire agli utenti un’informazione libera e diversificata, Facebook e compagnia non farebbero che mostrarci quello che vogliamo vedere, tenendoci spesso al riparo da informazioni che potrebbero incrinare le nostre certezze e rendere la nostra esperienza sui social media meno confortevole, questo rendere sempre più piacevole il trascorrere il tempo nei social ha come effetto un aumentando della permanenza e la dipendenza da social.

Se è vero che i social hanno accorciato le distante e favorito lo scambio e la comunicazione a distanza, è altrettanto vero che il prezzo da pagare in termini di rinuncia alla privacy e controllo sociale è davvero troppo alto.

Simile a Twitter nelle funzionalità, le caratteristiche di Mastodon Italia sono profondamente e concettualmente molto diverse, al punto di farne una sorta di anti-Facebook. Anzitutto la tutela dell'anonimato, questione maggiormente critica se consideriamo la creatura di Mark Zuckerberg. Mastodon, invece, è pensato e sviluppato per non pubblicare né conservare alcun dato sensibile, a tutela della privacy degli utenti. In questo senso, dunque, non profila e non detiene alcun dato personali a scopi commerciali o politici, non utilizza pubblicità o script che potrebbero profilare gli utenti e venderli per scopi commerciali ma si mantiene con le donazioni su Patreon.
Il software Mastodon non monitora tutto quel genere di informazioni che invece vengono registrare da piattaforme sociali correlate come Twitter, Instagram o Facebook: non calcola chi secondo lui potrebbe diventar mio amico/a. Non registra i millisecondi su cui mi soffermo su un’immagine, gli errori di battitura, i like, il tasso di engagement o il tipo di relazione che intercorre tra me ed un altro utente, quale sia il mio lavoro, i luoghi che visito. Non geolocalizza la mia posizione. Come vedremo, Mastodon manco mi chiede come mi chiamo e non mi obbliga nemmanco a comunicargli tutti i numeri nella mia Rubrica. Inoltre, come vedremo, puoi far sì che non sia in grado di leggere quel che tu scrivi. Il software Mastodon, insomma, raccoglie giusto le informazioni tecniche necessarie a funzionare.
Mastodon non é legato a doppio filo al tuo telefono o ad una singola app, per cui puoi accederci attraverso una delle app per android e iphone gratuite e open source, ma anche se il telefono l’avessi perso o distrutto potrai utilizzarlo. In effetti si può benissimo usare Mastodon su PC Linux, Windows, Mac e su qualsiasi altro dispositivo via Browser senza mai dover dare il tuo numero di telefono.
Il software utilizzato dai server Mastodon é F.L.O.S.S. ossia aperto, libero e verificabile da chiunque. Qualsiasi persona capace di programmare può verificare ciò che il software Mastodon fa, esattamente come un meccanico che può aprire un cofano, vedere il motore, trovarne i difetti, metterci le mani e migliorarlo
Mastodon, inoltre, viene gestito in modo collettivo, senza un vero e proprio padrone, ogni contenuto inserito rimane di proprietà dell'utente, può essere esportato e salvato per intero e utilizzato per altre piattaforme compatibili, in questo modo non si perderanno mai i contatti e i contenuti creati.
Mastodon.uno è autogestito ed autofinanziato, non è una società che cerca di creare profitto dalla tua vita e dai tuoi contenuti. Il tuo supporto via Patreon o Liberapay è fondamentale per mantenere questo servizio attivo ed efficiente.





Puoi seguire Mastodon.uno sui profili ufficiali:
Matrix> NoBlogo>
Mastodon>
Peertube>
Twitter>
Pixelfed>.

title: 长毛象中文站
short_description: 长毛象中文站是一个开放、友好、有爱的社区。长毛象中文站主题为喵、汪、各种动物、社交、科技、编程及生活。我们欢迎友好、热情、乐于分享的朋友，无论你的兴趣点是什么。
description:
CMX.IM是长毛象(Mastodon)的一个中文实例。Mastodon 是一个开源的、符合 GNU Social 规范的去中心化社交网络，整个长毛象社区是由无数实例组成的。注册本社区后你不仅可以与本实例内的用户互动，并且可以与来自世界各地的其他实例中的用户无缝连接。

长毛象中文站主题为喵，汪，各种动物，社交，科技，编程及生活。我们欢迎友好、热情、乐于分享的朋友，无论你的兴趣点是什么。

使用必读：安家前请先阅读本站详情页。

社区规则： 为了您安家后的使用体验，请详细阅读长毛象中文站社区规则。

使用指南： Mastodon 中文官方文档 (备用地址)

免翻墙备用镜像站： 我们提供备用地址，特供不方便使用VPN的中国用户不需翻墙访问本站。请登录后在网页版的站内公告栏获取免翻墙备用地址与使用方式。

rules.text: 【用户交流】禁止发布对性取向、性癖、爱好、信仰、宗教、政治立场、民族、地域等的侮辱性言论
【用户交流】禁止对任何用户发送具有骚扰、猥亵、恐吓、威胁、诱骗、霸凌性质的内容、不受欢迎的性暗示内容，或其他令他人感到不安或不适、打扰他人正常生活的内容
【用户交流】请不要发布种族主义、性别主义、同性恋恐惧以及跨性别恐惧、TERF 言论
【敏感内容】只要涉及成人内容，包括文字及媒体，均需使用恰当的CW标签及隐藏内容警告
【敏感内容】请不要发布违反伦理及社会共识的内容
【使用行为】禁止对其他用户实施任何人肉行为
【使用行为】禁止使用包括但不限于任何形式的自动化程序等手段大量获取本站的数据
【使用行为】机器人账户不得滥用服务器资源
【使用行为】禁止冒用他人身份注册账号或发布冒用他人身份的嘟文
【使用行为】禁止将本站服务用于正常交流以外的用途的滥用行为
【使用行为】禁止散布计算机恶意程序
【广告及推广】请不要推广虚假、诈骗、或违反本站服务条款的内容
【广告及推广】请不要发布重复推广内容或重复刷屏
【广告及推广】请不要发布与本站用户完全不相干的推广内容
【知识产权】请不要发布盗版内容
【知识产权】请不要在未经作者授权的情况下发布他人作品
【政治言论】请不要发布针对政体、政党、社团、国家的仇恨性言论。
【政治言论】请不要鼓吹、鼓动极端思想。
【政治言论】请不要对持不同政见，或者压根对该话题不感兴趣的用户发表侮辱性言论。

【请阅读新用户注册须知】 
1. 完整版实例规则请见 https://cmx-im.github.io/terms.html 
2. 为了确认您已经阅读了本页的规则，在下一步的 “您为什么想在 m.cmx.im 上注册” 一栏中，请回答以下开放性问题，答案没有对错，请自由挥发作答；但若答非所问，注册将被拒绝：「请推荐一部你最喜欢的📙书籍或🎞️影视作品，并简要说明原因」 
3. 请勿使用无法正常收到邮件的临时邮箱或不存在的邮箱地址注册本站。 
4. 开设机器人账户需在注册理由中说明。
我知悉违反任何服务器规则都可能导致删除个别嘟文，或隐藏/封禁整个账号，创建账号即表示我接受所有规则。

rules.text: Respect the laws of the Netherlands and the Isle of Man, including those related to hate speech and defamation.

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Do not harass or bully other users.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Do not spam or engage in any form of malicious activity.
Keep discussions civil and respectful, and refrain from using derogatory language or engaging in personal attacks.
Do not reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Use appropriate tags and content warnings when posting potentially sensitive or triggering content.
If you see a violation of these rules, report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you are at least 18 years old.

rules.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, transfeindliche, ableistische, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

title: LGBTQIA+ and Tech

description:
*Currently, signup is disabled while we work on server growth and maintenance. Users now have the ability to send invite links directly for others to sign up.*

*Due to increased bot signup, manual approval is required. Please write some applicable request text on signup with why you want to join. Submissions that fail to do so will be denied.*

This Mastodon instance is for tech workers, academics, students, and others interested in tech who are LGBTQIA+ or Allies.

Wondering what Mastodon is? Check out joinmastodon.org! In essence, Mastodon is a decentralized, open source social network.

Props to @bleeptrack@chaos.social for the Mastodon art!

rules.text:
Discrimination & Bigotry Won’t Be Tolerated.

We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech. Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

Respect Other Users.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Consent is Important in all contexts.

If you’re ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.

Listen; Don’t Make Excuses.

If you’re accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.

No Pedophilia or Zoophilia.

This includes artistic depictions of characters that cannot give consent.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.

Use the Report Feature.
Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.

rules.text: Don’t do anything that’s illegal in the UK or EU.
Aggression and elitism are unwelcome here - it’s not a competition. Don’t assume you know better than the person you’re talking to.

We want to be inclusive; do not engage in exclusionary behaviour or language against anyone based on their race, caste, gender (binary, assigned or otherwise), disability, mental health, sexual orientation, level of education or age.
Don’t make exclusionary jokes. Don’t even make them “ironically”.
Don’t harass people. Unconsented contact or sexual attention can constitute harassment, even if it wasn’t intended to cause upset. Dressing or acting in a certain way is not consent.

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language; or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia, casteist, or other hateful ideologies.
Do not post content that is illegal in the USA or California.
rules.hint: This includes unlicensed media. We will remove copyrighted content in response to a valid DMCA notice per our policy.

rules.text: Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in name calling or personal attacks.
Do not post or threaten to post other people’s personally identifying information (“doxxing”).
Do not tone police.
Do not “shitpost” hateful content
rules.hint: While humorous posts are allowed, even encouraged, “shitposting” is not an exception to rules 1 or 3. There are no ironic slurs.

rules.text: Do not sell or promote cryptocurrencies or NFTs.
Do not litigate moderation decisions on the timeline.
rules.hint: You can direct message @moderators with concerns.

rules.text: Mark content that contains nudity, gore, violence, etc. as sensitive and clearly label it with a content warning and/or hashtag.
Do not post spam.
rules.hint: There is additional information about what SFBA.social considers spam on the information hub: https://hub.sfba.social/2024/07/05/sfba-social-spam-policy/

No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

rules.text: 자커마스는 자작 캐릭터 커뮤니티를 위한 마스토돈 인스턴스입니다. 이외 목적의 계정은 사전에 승인받은 경우를 제외하고 7월 11일 오후 10시 이후 금지됩니다.
19세 이상 이용가 내용을 민감한 콘텐츠 체크나 CW 없이 업로드할 수 없습니다.
모든 종류의 혐오 발언을 사용할 수 없습니다. 불가피하게 사용시 열람 주의(CW) 기능을 사용해야 하며, 로컬/연합 타임라인에 노출되지 않도록 프라이버시 설정을 공개로 설정해서는 안됩니다.
기본 공개 범위는 비표시를 권장합니다.
공개 타임라인에는 커뮤니티 홍보지 등 누구나 봐야 하는 내용만 업로드 가능합니다. 이외 업로드시 계정 침묵 처리 등 조치가 이루어질 수 있습니다.
타 인스턴스와 교류는 인스턴스 특징상 권장하지 않습니다. 기본적으로 차단하지는 않으나 특정 인스턴스의 요청이 있다면(공개 타임라인 오염 등) 인스턴스 단위 차단이 이루어질 수 있습니다.
일회용 이메일로 가입을 지양합니다. 추후 계정을 찾게 될 수 없게 될수 있으며 이메일 확인시 인증이 불필요한 특성상 타인이 계정 정보를 탈취할 수 있습니다.
총괄 계정은 공지 계정으로 DM(개인적인 멘션)을 보내 주시면 총괄 권한을 부여해 드립니다. 커뮤니티 총괄 계정은 초대 링크를 생성할 수 있습니다.

title: Mastodon Japan Server
short_description:
こちらはMastodon Japan Server、日本居住および日本語話者向けの汎用サーバーです。
ただし日本国外居住者及び非日本語話者を除外するものではありません。ルール（利用規約）をご確認の上で平和に遊ぼう。
description:
Mastodon Japan Server へようこそ！！！


こちらはMastodon Japan Server、日本居住および日本語話者向けの汎用サーバーです。
ただし日本国外居住者及び非日本語話者を除外するものではありません。

新規登録の確認メールが"迷惑メール"に分類される可能性があります。
10分ほど経っても到着しない場合は当該フォルダをご確認ください。

contact_account.note:
遊び場は作った🏞ルールも作った📝あとは平和に遊ぼう :blobtoofast:

【Japan鯖のご新規さんへ】大事なお知らせはWebの「ホーム上部のお知らせ📢」に表示されます。時々確認してくださいね。

初心者向け・ご新規向けの情報は固定された投稿にあります。（タイムラインと投稿の種類だけ是非覚えてくださいね）

平日昼間以外（パソコンの前にいない時）は、返信や通知に気が付きません :blobcat:
エアリプに気がつかないことが多いデス。

好きなものはおバイク、おクルマ、MotoGP、美味しいもの、美しい自然風景、のんびりとした時間、読書、コーヒー。
苦手なものは攻撃的な言葉。

普段はのほほんと役に立たないことを投稿しています。よめりんごさん＆こりんごさんが大好きで、日常的に惚気が多いです。それを好まない人はフォロー非推奨です。

アイコンは @michiko さん作

title: sueden.social
short_description: Eine Community für alle, die sich dem Süden hingezogen fühlen. Wir können alles außer Hochdeutsch.
description: Servus! Willkommen auf sueden.social, ein Ort für Verehrer der Kehrwoche, Maultaschen, Brezeln, Dialekte und Biergenießer. Wir sind übrigens auch unter süden.social erreichbar. Hier sollen sich alle wohlfühlen, die sich dem Süden hingezogen fühlen

contact_account.note: Hier ist das Admin Team von süden.social.

rules.text: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.
Diskriminiere niemanden. Rassistische, sexistische, frauenfeindliche, homophobe, antisemitische und andere menschenfeindliche Beiträge sind bei uns verboten!
Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Wir legen Wert auf eine gesunde Kommunikation untereinander. Falls du deinen Account nur benutzt um Links zu teilen und ohne Rücksicht Crossposter verwendest, oder für Referral-Link nutzt, werden wir Admins uns bei dir melden.
Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen möchtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet für dich.
Wir dulden keine Belästigung, einschließlich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden möchte.
Wir dulden keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen.

Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Du möchtest auch mit Respekt behandelt werden. Beachte, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverständnisse zu eskalieren.

Automatisierte Beiträge sollten als "Nicht gelistet" gepostet werden (d. h. sie sind sichtbar, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Dies gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können von uns entfernt werden.
Wir dulden keine Verschwörungstheorien, die das oben genannte (und/oder ähnliche) Verhalten unterstützen oder dazu führen.

short_description: DEFCON.social is a place for hackers, researchers, artists, infosec, cyberpunks & those interested in the intersection of technology and society.

contact_account.note: The official Support account for DEFCON.social

fields.name: Support Website
fields.value: https://www.defcon.social/

rules.text: DEFCON.social is an inclusive instance and will moderate against bigotry, homophobia, supremacy, and edge-lord behavior
We don't condone harassment against any user, for any reason. Harassment can be generally or specifically targeted to make users feel uncomfortable, unwelcome, or afraid

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Anyone can report harassment. If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, you can report
Follow our Code of Conduct https://defcon.org/html/links/dc-code-of-conduct.html
Don't break laws here, ask others to break laws here, admit to breaking laws
Pornography, Nudity, Links to illegal content, spam and commercial advertising are forbidden. Promoting your own projects in moderation is OK
Be polite: Mark a CW for spoilers
No account impersonation. If you claim you are the BBC World News and you aren't, don't be surprised if your account is suspended. Identity is tricky enough as it is
Mark your account type as "Bot" if you act like a bot or are one. For example automated posting or re-posting of other accounts
You must be at least 13 years old to create an account (US COPA, CCPA, UK AADC, etc.)

rules.text: Posts that contain nudity, sexually explicit, or violent content must be marked with an "NSFW" content warning, and media marked as sensitive when posting.
rules.hint: See https://fedi.tips/how-to-use-content-warnings-cws-on-mastodon-and-the-fediverse/ for how to use CW.

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
rules.hint: This rule is written as it is on mastodon.social as well as many other generalist instances. The omission of any specific term is not intentional, and bad faith attempts to challenge the exact terminology are considered to be in violation of the rule.

rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States, Germany, or Finland
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

Bots must be marked as bots in their profile preferences, and automated posts should be unlisted (exceptions apply). Twitter-mirroring instances like BirdsiteLIVE will be suspended, if you want to browse Twitter, use Twitter.
rules.hint: Any accounts that produce automated posts and do not plan to manually respond to replies are considered "bots" here. This rule applies to all bots, other than local accounts that provide content of general public interest AND post at an average frequency of at most once per hour with reasonable spacing. Other exceptions may be granted on a case-by-case basis.

rules.text: Do not spam or abuse network features.
You must select the appropriate language for each post.
rules.hint: See https://fedi.tips/setting-your-language-preferences-on-mastodon-and-filtering-out-posts-in-other-languages/. This is necessary for the proper functioning of the timeline language filter. If a post is in multiple languages, choose one that represents a significant part of the post.

rules.text: Please read https://mpp.bus-hit.me for moderation information and best practices.

rules.text: Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden möchten.
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet
Verharmlosende oder gutheißende Inhalte zu Weißer Vorherrschaft, Antisemitismus, Transphobie oder anderen hasserfüllten Ideologien werden nicht geduldet.
Nochmal ganz deutlich: Wir dulden keine nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus!
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte. Dazu gehören auch Witze und Kommentare.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze (verbietet u.a. auch gewaltverherrlichende Inhalte).

Veröffentliche keinen Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen für Posts und NSFW-Marker bei Medien im Falle von kontroversen, aufrührerischen oder triggernden Themen
Keine Killerphrasen, Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus
Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen nicht zuerst in öffentlichen Toots
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht

title: mastodont.cat, cultura catalana.
short_description: Des del 13 d'abril del 2017, el primer i original servidor social en català per a la comunitat de llengua i cultura catalanes d'arreu d'internet.
description:
mastodont.cat és un servidor en català de Mastodon, per a la comunitat de llengua i cultura catalanes d'arreu d'internet.
Mastodon és un programari lliure i descentralitzat.
Mastodon és dels humans i no dels algoritmes ni dels interessos de corporacions.
Mastodon és per a les persones. No és pas pels anunciants ni pels recol·lectors de dades.
A mastodont.cat no rebràs publicitat de cap mena i les teves dades no seran venudes a terceres parts.

contact_account.note:
Mantinc el català arreu dels Països Catalans. També a les xarxes socials.

Vull la independència de Catalunya.

M'encanta programar amb Python.

blog: https://blog.mastodont.cat/author/spla
xmpp: xmpp:spla@mastodont.cat
pixelfed: @spla

fields.name: verificació
fields.value: https://codeberg.org/spla

fields.name: donació via Paypal
fields.value: https://paypal.me/donacionsmastodont

rules.text: No és permès fer publicitat ni spam.
No s'accepta l'ús de "crossposters" (ponts que connecten xarxes diferents).
Aquest servidor bloqueja totes les instàncies del programari birdsitelive
La política de retenció dels fitxers multi mèdia remots és de 30 dies (seràn esborrats automàticament als 30 dies). Els arxius d'usuari seran esborrats als 7 dies.
Està prohibida qualsevol mostra de racisme, xenofòbia o homofòbia contra cap usuari local o remot.
L'ús d'altres llengües diferents del català en la majoria dels tuts publicats, pot provocar un avís i fins i tot suspensió del compte si és repetitiu.
Està prohibida qualsevol mostra de nuesa, excepte quan aquesta tingui una procedència artística reconeguda i estigui degudament referenciada en el contingut del missatge

Està prohibida qualsevol mostra explícita de contingut sexual o pornogràfic, i especialment aquelles que continguin pederàstia o impliquin a menors d'edat, fet que a més serà denunciat a les autoritats pertinents.
No és permeten faltes de respecte contra usuaris locals o remots.

Els serveis addicionals de Blog (Wordpress), Git (Forgejo) i xmpp (Ejabberd), estan dedicats als usuaris actius. Els comptes registrats en aquests serveis addicionals seran esborrats si es detecta una falta d'activitat, a mastodont.cat i en els darrers 30 dies, dels usuaris locals relacionats.

rules.text: Be friendly and polite to each other
No hate speech, no discrimination of others, regardless of their age, gender, nationality or whatever
No spamming of any kind.
Don't annoy others and don't get easily annoyed by others.
No advertisements of commercial products.
No distribution of copyrighted material.
Do not upload material for which you don't have the rights
No automated posts by bots, except when you have permission to do so by the server admins
Don't abuse this service or server.
Treat other how you want to be treated by them - with respect!

This is a service running on a private server and as a friendly user you are welcome to use this service, but in the end the server admin can cancel user accounts and will do when the user misbehaves. The admin will decide in the end.
Valid mail address required! You'll receive reminder mail after 6 months of inactivity to log in again. If you don't react to those mails, your account will be deleted after 7 months of inactivity.
Allowed languages are German and English as main languages while as the following languages are tolerated: Dutch, French, Spanish, Italian.

This service is free of cost for you.
However offering this service does have cost implications. If you can afford some cents per week it would be great when you could contribute in sharing the server costs. Of course this voluntarily for you.

No free-speech extremists, no far-right extremists, no nationalists. This includes people that elect or support such political parties like AfD in Germany, Fratelli d'Italia in Italy or Rassemblement National in France, etc.. If you support these parties, this instance is not for you.
Alt Texts for Pictures encouraged. Please conduct descriptive texts for pictures you upload (Alt Texts). This helps visually impaired users and others enormously in their online life.

title: Mastodon.eus
short_description:
Mastodon.eus euskara eta euskal kulturaren komunitatearentzat sortutako Mastodon instantzia bat da.

2018an hauek sortua: Azkue Fund, Dinahosting, iametza, Laborategia.eus, PuntuEUS eta Talaios Koop
description: Euskal komunitatearen fedibertsoko txokoa mastodon.eus euskal komunitateak sare sozial libre eta deszentralizatu honetan bere espazioa izan dezan helburuarekin abiatu da. Ez dakizu zer den Mastodon? Zalantzak dituzu? kaixo.mastodon.eus webgunean informazio interesgarria aurkituko duzu: * Nola hasi atala: Kontua sortu, pertsonalizatu eta lehen toot-a bidaltzeko pausoz pausoko azalpenak *Ohiko galderak atala: Mastodoni buruzko ohiko zalantzak, kontzeptuak eta terminologia, erabiltzaileak eta kontuak, aplikazioak, mastodon.eus... Prentsa atala: Kazetari, blogari eta abarrentzat materiala. Momentuz Mastodon.eus eta Mastodon logoak. Aurrerago material gehiago mastodon.eus hainbat eragileren arteko elkarlanetik jaio da, denboran irauteko helburuarekin eta euskarazko komunitatearen inguruan sor daitezkeen bestelako instantziekin erkatzeko borondatearekin, baita, beronen inguruan eragile gehiago biltzen joateko asmoarekin ere. Hasiera batean honako erakunde eta pertsonen ekimenez abiatu da egitasmo hau: *PuntuEUS Fundazioa *Azkue Fundazioa *Iametza *Laborategia 2.0 *Talaios Koop. *Dinahosting

description:
Willkommen auf der Mastodon Instanz von Anoxinon.de!

Anoxinon ist ein nicht-kommerzieller Verein, dessen Ziel es ist, Bürger zu Informieren und freie Software zu stärken.

Die Kernthemen unserer Instanz drehen sich derzeit um: Allgemeines, Technik, Datenschutz und Föderation. Jedoch wird hier natürlich jede andere Person auch gerne gesehen.

Mastodon ist eine dezentralisierte Alternative zu Sozialen Netzwerken wie Twitter und bringt mehrere Vorteile mit sich.

Beiträge mit rassistischen, illegalen, pornografischen oder gewaltverherrlichenden Inhalten sind strengstens untersagt. Zudem gelten allgemein deutsche Gesetze.
Beleidigungen und Belästigungen sind generell verboten. Darunter fallen auch jegliche Formen der Diffamierung, Hetze, übler Nachrede und dergleichen.

Konten für kommerzielle Zwecke erfordern eine schriftliche Erlaubnis unsererseits. Bis auf RSS-Bots 
benötigen alle anderen die schriftliche Zustimmung von unserer Seite.
Zuwiderhandlungen gegen diese Regeln werden mit Ermahnung, Verwarnung oder Sperre geahndet.

title: Mastodon NZ
short_description:
A Mastodon instance hosted in New Zealand. Made for kiwis and honorary kiwis home and abroad!

Status page @ https://status.fediservices.nz/
description:
A Mastodon server hosted in New Zealand.

Donations to assist with costs are greatly appreciated but not required - https://opencollective.com/nz-federated-services

contact_account.note:
Administrative account for mastodon.nz.

This instance is run by volunteers, feel free to support us here to assist with costs: https://donate.deadnet.nz/ <3

Moderators can be found here - @themods

rules.text: You must read the rules.

You MUST describe your link to NZ as part of your reason for wanting to join on the next page. Applications without this will be declined. You must be a kiwi or honorary kiwi, at home or abroad, to join Mastodon.nz.
You may only have one account on Mastodon.nz and be at least 13 years of age.
Personal accounts only. We do not allow bots, commercial, business, organisation or purely promotional accounts.
Automated cross-posting from other services such as twitter is considered to be a bot and is not allowed. If you have a blog or something and you want feed that through, this is generally fine.

No spamming. The occasional mention of your shop, fundraiser etc. is fine. It's hard to give a defined daily limit of what constitutes spam. Personal or professional (i.e. Mutual Aid/Kickstarters) fundraisers must be clearly tagged as such.

Content Warnings are mandatory on posts containing gore and/or violence. Posts about politics must be tagged one or more of #nzpol, #tōrangapū, #pol, and/or #politics, and optionally may be content warned.
No impersonation of others. We may consider obvious parody accounts, but they must be agreed with @theMods in advance.
No hate speech, racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.
No illegal content, gore or violence for the sake of it, incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies or conspiracy theories.
No NSFW content. A bit of casual swearing is fine, but don't be derogatory or aggressive to other users (see rule 12).
Be kind. No abuse or harassment will be tolerated.
No doxxing other users.
Content hosted on Mastodon.nz or produced by its users may not be reused outside of the fediverse without the express permission of the author(s).
Mastodon.nz complies with copyright laws. We expect you to as well. Your content must be your own or acceptable use.

Image descriptions: It is expected that users will add image descriptions to their uploads for
our visually impaired users. Unless there is a reason you can not, you must do so.
Copy of rules with more detailed guidance can be found at https://mastodon.nz/rules.pdf

rules.text:
No bots

... unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
No pornography or nudity, or something that would be considered "NSFW" in a workplace, even behind a NSFW warning. In particular, no sexual depictions of children.
No gore or graphic violence. Again, if you wouldn't post it at work, you definitely shouldn't be posting it here.
Use content warnings. Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)
No racism. This should go without saying, but unfortunately it doesn't.

No sexism

... or pretty much any other -ism

No discrimination. Any discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin, will result in your account and content being removed.
No xenophobia. This includes violent nationalism.
No holocaust denialism. No Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union
No stalking or harassment of any kind

No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts.
No "follow bots." We block these and our instance is on a "no bots" list

No advertising or excessive promotion. By far the biggest problem we've had running this server are spam accounts that sign up only to promote some company (often nothing even to do with Ruby), and so we take a fairly strong stance against letting such accounts even register on the server now.

rules.text: Intenta mantener tu perfil y publicaciones mayormente en sintonía con la temática de la instancia: videojuegos, anime, manga, comics, series, cine, gastronomía, literatura, viajes y demás hobbies y temas relacionados.
Sé amable y evita mal comportamiento, incluyendo racismo y discriminación de cualquier índole; las cuentas disruptivas podrían ser suspendidas. Trata a la gente como te gustaría que te tratasen.
Habla principalmente en español, con opción de otros idiomas del territorio español; usa lenguaje inclusivo si lo deseas.
No compartas pornografía infantil ni violencia; evita contenido ilegal bajo leyes españolas.
Eres responsable de tus comentarios y publicaciones.

Evita promover activismo, política institucional y proselitismo religioso. Se permiten temas políticos contextualizados y relacionados con la temática de la instancia. La promoción de nazismo, supremacía e ideologías ultra, religión o magufadas están estrictamente prohibidas.
No compartas información falsa intencionalmente. En caso de hacerlo, retira cualquier bulo compartido si se verifica como tal.
El contenido de adultos salvo la pornografía explícita, está permitido solo como forma de arte con la etiqueta CW, si es de tu autoría y se relaciona con la temática.
Prohibido las cuentas centradas en el crossposting. Las cuentas que abusen de esta práctica pueden ser suspendidas.
Las cuentas que promocionen SPAM, phishing o criptoactivos están prohibidas.

El uso de IA para generar contenido es permitido si no se dedica a la promoción de dicho contenido. Las cuentas que promuevan activamente contenido generado por IA, tanto en el servidor como en sitios externos, serán prohibidas y pueden ser advertidas o canceladas por el equipo de moderación.

El equipo de moderación se reserva el derecho de actuar como crea conveniente según las circunstancias y siempre velando por el buen funcionamiento para mantener la concordia en la instancia por algún motivo que no se cite expresamente en las normas anteriores.

rules.text: Before signing up please read the full set of principles, rules and guidelines
We stand for climate justice, which includes justice for all marginalized people as well as other living beings and we stand against discrimination and exploitation.
rules.hint: We are allies to disabled people, queer and lgbtqia* people, BIPoC, women, poor people, kids and future generations as well as other vulnerable groups including animals, plants and all living beings. We might be critical to religion in general, but stand up against antisemitism, islamomisia and other forms of discrimination due to religious background. We acknowledge our own privileges and work on our own unintentionally discriminatory behaviors. We are all part of an exploitative system and it's impossible to live within that system without harming anyone. We are aware of that and try to work against it, but we are not all fossil free and vegan and that's okay. We don't exclusively post about climate justice, but at least some of our posts should be about climate justice.

rules.text: We consider ourselves on the left side of the political spectrum and stand up against right wing ideologies.
rules.hint: We have different political views, but are all on the left side or at least are left-open, but right-closed centrists. We stand together against capitalism and fascism and even if we disagree on important issues we don't loose sight of our common goals.

rules.text: We believe the Fediverse should be a place for respectful discourse and we stand against harassment, trolling and spam.
rules.hint: Everybody's boundaries are to be respected.

rules.text: We stand up for peace and against violence, oppression and authoritarianism.
rules.hint: We are pacifists, but acknowledge that when attacked, people have the right to defend themselves following international law. We may be critical of states in general, but we never deny any country their statehood. We condemn violence against innocent people and always show solidarity with victims of violence. We don't promote violence in protest, but peaceful sabotage against oppressors is not violence.

rules.text: We stand behind the science and against fake-news & propaganda.
rules.hint: We are not all scientists ourselves and experts in every field we post about, but we try not to spread any false information. If possible we provide reliable sources. We don't spread unverified rumors.

rules.text: Also, we stick to Austrian and EU law and we don't post pornography.
We try to follow the following guidelines
rules.hint:
If you can, please provide media descriptions if you post images or videos. There is a "caption" field available for that once you add media to a post you create. If you can't (atm) write a caption for whatever reason, that is okay - nobody should force or shame you. But if possible then please add the hashtag #AltForMe so someone else may write a caption for your media.

Please try to use CamelCase in your hashtags to make them more readable (also for screenreaders). Camel Case means you capitalize each first letter of a word when the hashtag consists of more than one word (or a not very common compound word).

Try not to overdo it with emojis, as they are each read out loud by screenreaders and that can be really annoying to hear, especially since some emojis are represented by a lot of text.

Please try to use the content warning (CW) feature when you write about something that might upset someone. We don't provide any rules as to what type of content should be hidden behind a CW, but try to think for yourself.

Please also hide media that might be upsetting as "sensitive".

If there is any way, please try to avoid linking to websites that violate visitors' privacy. Sometimes you'll find the same content you want to link to on a privacy respecting website or there is a proxy/mirroring service or archive available. If you can't find an alternative please make sure you don't post a shortened url, so people know what they click on.

rules.text: Disclaimer
rules.hint: Principles, rules and guidelines may change at any time and sanctions may be applied according to rules that have not been written yet at that time, but of course never without justification. Appeal is always possible.

short_description: Metalhead.club is a Mastodon instance hosted in Germany and powered by 100% green energy.
description:
Metalhead.club is a Mastodon instance hosted in Germany and powered by 100% green energy. Mastodon is a free and decentralized alternative to well-established social microblogging platforms like Twitter. This instance is especially addressing Metal fans, but of course everybody is welcome to use metalhead.club. If you're using this Mastodon instance, please consider a single donation or monthly, recurring donations via LiberaPay to keep this instance metalling hard.
You can find more information about donations here: donate.650thz.de

title: Urbanists.Social
short_description: We're a server for people who like bikes, transit, and walkable cities. Let's get to know each other!
description: We're a Mastodon server for people who like bikes, transit, and walkable cities!

contact_account.note: Hello! We’re the account for the Urbanists.Social admins. We use this for announcements, boosting cool posts from our server, and following admins from other servers to keep up with #fediblock.

rules.text: Please don't post anything that's illegal in the US or EU.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination.

Punch Nazis, trebuchet TERFs. Any posts or usage containing nazi symbolism or ideology, or which contains "gender critical" / "just asking questions" shit will get you banned immediately and without recourse.
No promotion of crypto or NFTs.
NSFW content must be behind a content warning / marked as sensitive. Your profile (avatar, header, display name, etc.) must be SFW.
Don't abuse the instance or use it to abuse other federated instances. Don't try to break things.

Be considerate. Keep in mind that any public post you make will appear in our public timeline and the public timelines of other instances federated with Urbanists.Social. Use content warnings where appropriate. Use NSWF tags where appropriate. Don't be a jerk about it.
Bots are allowed, but don't make them annoying. Admins will ask you to move your bot to another instance if it becomes a problem.
Do not harass other users.

Администрация сервера/модерационный состав будет рассматривать и решать спорные случаи исходя из ситуации и с учётом предыдущих жалоб на пользователей.
Уважаемые щитпостеры, просим вас знать меру и не засорять ленты спамом. Излишнее злоупотребление будет наказываться.

Проставляйте Content Warning и NSFW-метки на спорный контент (политика, описание/изображения жестоких сцен, сцен насилия, крови, порнографии, эротики, хентая, использование оскорбительной лексики, и.т.п)
Свобода слова не означает вседозволенность

Убедительная просьба: заполняйте описания картинок. Это не обязательно, но очень сильно выручает незрячих пользователей, и не отнимает много времени
ПОДАЧА ЗАЯВКИ НА РЕГИСТРАЦИЮ: ЗАЯВКИ МЕНЕЕ ПЯТИ СЛОВ ОТКЛОНЯЮТСЯ АВТОМАТИЧЕСКИ! Если не знаете, что написать, пишите о себе, как узнали о нас, чем вам интересен Мастодон, чем увлекаетесь.

rules.text: Nudity and sexually explicit content is prohibited for accounts registered on this instance
rules.hint: You can register on mstdn.party instead, which is administered by the same staff team.

rules.text: Violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
rules.hint: This rule is written as it is on mastodon.social as well as many other generalist instances. The omission of any specific term is not intentional, and bad faith attempts to challenge the exact terminology are considered to be in violation of the rule.

rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States, Germany, or Finland
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Bots must be marked as bots in their profile preferences, and automated posts should be unlisted.
rules.hint: Any accounts that produce automated posts and do not plan to manually respond to replies are considered "bots" here. This rule applies to all bots, other than local accounts that provide content of general public interest AND post at an average frequency of at most once per hour with reasonable spacing. Other exceptions may be granted on a case-by-case basis.

rules.text: You must select the appropriate language for each post.
rules.hint: See https://fedi.tips/setting-your-language-preferences-on-mastodon-and-filtering-out-posts-in-other-languages/. This is necessary for the proper functioning of the timeline language filter. If a post is in multiple languages, choose one that represents a significant part of the post.

rules.text: Do not spam or abuse network features.
Please read https://mpp.bus-hit.me for moderation information and best practices.

rules.text: 無任何形式的歧視（包括種族主義、性別歧視、仇視同性戀、仇視變性人、仇外心理、種姓歧視、能力歧視等）

rules.text: 不得煽動暴力或宣揚暴力意識形態。
rules.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

rules.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

rules.text: 切勿分享衆所周知的虛假和誤導性信息。
rules.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

rules.text: 引用 TA 人所創造的內容時必須註明來源，並且必須主動表明是否使用了人工智能。
rules.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

rules.text: 這裡不歡迎商業廣告、服務推廣和搜索引擎優化消息。宣傳自己的作品除外！

rules.text: 自由傳播，自由批評，自由信，自由不信。好好說話！
rules.hint: Free to spread, free to criticize, free to believe or not to believe. Let's communicate with each other in a friendly manner!

title: 우리.인생
short_description: 우리.인생(uri.life)은 다툼과 차별, 혐오에 지친 나와 여러분, 우리를 위한 안식처입니다.

contact_account.note: 우리.인생 :mastodon:의 소식을 전해 드립니다.

rules.text: 차별하지 마세요.
rules.hint: 성별 및 성 정체성, 성 지향성, 출신 지역, 신체적 특성, 장애 여부 등을 이유로 다른 사람을 차별하거나 혐오 발언을 하지 마세요.

rules.text: 괴롭히지 마세요.
rules.hint: 다른 사람에게 나쁜 말을 하거나 겁주는 행위, 압력을 가하는 행위 등으로 공포심을 일으키지 마세요.

rules.text: 귀찮게 굴지 마세요.
rules.hint: 다른 사람에게 반복적·일방적으로 멘션 혹은 DM(다이렉트 메시지)하거나, 콘텐츠에 반복적·일방적으로 반응하여 알림을 유발하는 등의 행위을 하지 마세요.

title: Todon.eu
short_description: Radical leftist anti-authoritarian. For anarchists, socialists, (climate) activists, LGBTQIA+, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, human rights, animal rights, etc. [sign-up using a webbrowser]
description:
Todon.eu is a radical leftist anti-authoritarian Mastodon server. We welcome anarchists, socialists, activists, the LGBTQIA+ community, environmentalists, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, vegans, pirates, human rights activists, etc. As far as they are radical, leftist ánd anti-authoritarian.



Deutsch

Todon.eu ist ein linksradikaler, antiautoritärer Mastodon-Server. Wir heißen Anarchist_innen, Sozialist_innen, Aktivist_innen, die LGBTQIA+-Gemeinschaft, Umweltbewegung, Antirassist_innen, Antifaschist_innen, Antikapitalist_innen, Intersektionalist_innen, Veganer_innen, Pirat_innen, Menschenrechtler_innen, etc. willkommen. Solange sie radikal, links únd antiautoritär sind.



Español

Todon.eu es un servidor de Mastodon de izquierda radical antiautoritaria. Damos la bienvenida a anarquistas, socialistas, activistas, personas del colectivo LGBTQIA+, ambientalistas, anti-racistas, anti-fascistas, anti-capitalistas, interseccionalistas, veganxs, piratas, activistas por los derechos humanos, etc. Siempre que sean radicales, de izquierdas y antiautoritarios.



Nederlands

Todon.eu is een radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire Mastodonserver. Wij verwelkomen anarchisten, socialisten, activisten, de LHBTQIA+-community, de milieubeweging, intersectionelen, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, veganisten, piraten, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Als ze maar radicaal, links én anti-autoritair zijn.



More

See todon.eu/about/more for more information in above languages, and links to machine translations in even more languages, our privacy police and of course our Terms of Service.

contact_account.note:
This account is used for 🎙 Todon.eu announcements and ⚖️ moderation.

🚫 Don't follow this account when you are not on Todon.eu.

New? First read our 👩‍🏫 Todon 101 👩‍🎓 at https://wiki.todon.eu/todon/101

⚖️ For all our moderators go to https://wiki.todon.eu/todon/moderators

📝 Public toots from this account are in English.

🔕 Criticism is fine, but people who do false accusations are muted.

✉ todon@posteo.eu

#nobot

rules.text: We do not accept racism (in all its forms, incl. hate against Muslims, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism - see our Terms of Service for our complete definition).
We do not accept hate against lesbians, gays, bisexuals, pansexuals,  transgenders, non-binary people, intersexual people, queer people in general, etc.
Sexism, misogyny and hate against black women (misogynoir).
We do not accept ableism (incl. COVID-19 denial/downplaying and anti-vax) and body-shaming.
We do not accept harassment and trolling.
We also do not accept other forms of hate speech.
We do not accept (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).
We do not accept glorification of non-political violence, calls for murder, death threats, terrorism and militarism.

We do not accept (neo)colonialism (incl. Zionism), imperialism in all forms and nationalism (above all nationalism of nation states,  incl. flags/symbols of those on Todon.*, see our Terms of Service).
We do not accept fascism, right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism.
We do not accept evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only], and extreme sects and cults.
We do not accept Marxist-Leninists (Stalinists, Maoists, etc) or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies).
We do not accept capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (aka ancaps) and neoliberals.
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, downplaying the climate crisis, greenwashing and deceptive climate solutions (like nuclear energy).
We do not accept (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, fake news and other forms of disinformation.
We do not accept posting content created by AI (artificial 'intelligence'), like art, music or text [local only].
Another rule in our terms of service at wiki.todon.eu/todon/terms_en. Explain in the final step (reports only).

rules.text:
Nichts Diskriminierendes:

Jegliche Form von Diskriminierung ist verboten. Das inkludiert, ist aber nicht beschränkt auf: Ableismus, Antisemitismus, Homofeindlichkeit, Islamophobie, Klassismus, Rassismus, Sexismus, Transfeindlichkeit, etc.

Nichts Belästigendes:

Kein Spam, Trolling, Bullying, oder ähnliche Belästigungen.
Keine Aufrufe zu Hass oder Gewalt.
Keine Pornographie.

Nichts Automatisiertes:

Keine Bots, kein Crossposting (z.B. spiegeln von Twitter posts etc.) ohne Kontext oder sonstiger Interaktion.

Nichts (absichtlich) Fälschliches:

Keine Fake-news, Falschinformationen, Wissenschaftsleugnung.
Keine Verbreitung von Gerüchten oder Propaganda.

Hinweis für Unternehmenskonten:

Unternehmenskonten, unternehmensähnliche Konten und/oder Geschäftskonten, sind nur mit Einschränkungen erlaubt. Inoffizielle Unternehmenskonten werden gesperrt.

rules.text: Rule #1 – Illegal Content or Conduct
rules.hint:
Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.

For the avoidance of doubt, this includes but is not limited to: Instructions on how to commit crimes, encouraging acts of violence or terrorism, child sexual abuse material (CSAM) or depictions thereof, and unauthorized access or exploitation of computer systems.

rules.text: Rule #2 – Discriminatory Conduct
rules.hint: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.

rules.text: Rule #3 – Stalking and Harassment
rules.hint:
Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesn’t want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

“Screenshot dunking”, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them.

rules.text: Rule #4 – Misinformation and Deceptive Content
rules.hint:
Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don’t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, “crypto” (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims.

rules.text: Rule #5 – Missing Content Warning
rules.hint: Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information.

rules.text: Rule #5.2 – Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message
rules.hint: Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.

rules.text: Rule #6 – No Spam or Advertising
rules.hint: Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule.

rules.text: Rule #7 – Disengage and Report Abuse
rules.hint:
If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We don’t want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help – If you’re unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and don’t think we’ve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system.

rules.text: Rule #8.1 – Account / Post Language Missing
rules.hint: We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning).

rules.text: Rule #8.2 – Account Impersonation
rules.hint: You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

rules.text: Rule #8.3 – Unmarked Bot Account
rules.hint: Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using “Unlisted”, “Followers only”, or “Mentioned people only”, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

rules.text: Rule #8.4 – Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts
rules.hint: No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services.

rules.text: Rule #8.5 – Bypassing Suspension
rules.hint: If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.

rules.text: Rule #8.6 – Prohibited Avatar / Header Image
rules.hint: All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).

rules.text: Full Code of Conduct
rules.hint: The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko – Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

rules.text:
Be nice to each other. No shitposting on this server.
Trolls will not be tolerated. Please act in a civilized manner.
No porn, explicit or violent media, racism, sexism, fascism, homophobia, or any other form of abusive behavior, harassment or hate speech.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No doxxing of users. Any form of harassment will not be tolerated.
No content illegal in Belgium or, by extension, EU law.

No intentional spreading of fake news, false information or misleading content.
This includes attempts to impersonate Mastodon staff.
No spam or advertising.

Politics and religion is tolerated but discouraged. Please use a Content Warning if you do post them.
Whatever your political or religious view may be is your concern but we'd appreciate it if you wouldn't use this platform to plaster it in other people's faces.

Please don't bring discussions from other Social Media channels over to Mastodon.
If you want to discuss a topic, please do it on the originating side.

If you're a commercial or government entity or you represent one, please consider hosting your own Mastodon instance.
This instance is set up and paid for by volunteers in order to give users access to the Fediverse.
It's not intended to be used as a commercial or governmental platform.

This is a private Mastodon instance, access to this server is a privilege and not a right.
The right to access and/or use this server may be revoked at any given time.

Interpretation of these rules is up to the server's admin discretion and is not open for discussion.
They may change without prior notice.

title: Ursalzona
short_description: A URSAL.zone é uma instância moderada com foco em militantes progressistas, feministas e antifascistas da América Latina.
description:
TEMPORARIAMENTE NÃO VAMOS ACEITAR MAIS INSCRIÇÕES.

A URSAL.zone é uma instância moderada com foco em militantes progressistas, feministas e antifascistas da América Latina contrários a todas as formas de opressão, exploração e humilhação entre seres humanos. Discursos de ódio, propagação de mentiras e pornografia comercial são proibidos. Leia nosso Código de Conduta para mais informações.

contact_account.note:
Presidenta da Ursal no Mastodon!
Se você acabou de chegar, leio a o fio tutorial fixado no meu perfil.

Admins: @Bruiserzinha @liaamancio @red
Sysadmin: @cadusilva

Para ajudar a instância: apoia.se/ursal

ursal.zone admin
ALT
Capa: imagens de ilustração de Elefante de pelúcia com um urso de pelúcia deitado em das cosas. Ambos numa floresta
Avatar: Ursinho vermelho fofo com foice e martelo na barriga.

rules.text: Trollagem
rules.hint: Comportamentos típicos de outras redes não serão permitidos nessa instância. Quem incorrer em xingamentos a usuários, acusações levianas e provocações desnecessárias será banido/a da instância.

rules.text: Nudez
rules.hint: Só permitida se for foto pessoal (não de terceiros), marcada com CW e alerta de conteúdo sensível na imagem.

rules.text: Pornografia
rules.hint: Nunca. Essa instância combate a pornografia comercial.

rules.text: Spam
rules.hint: Nunca. Independente do conteúdo, spam é caso de banimento.

rules.text: Links maliciosos
rules.hint: É proibido a divulgação de qualquer link malicioso ou para conteúdo ilegal.

rules.text: Spoiler (sem CW)
rules.hint: Também nunca. Qualquer spoiler precisa de aviso de conteúdo.

rules.text: Pornografia infantil
rules.hint: CSAM, pedofilia, ou qualquer conteúdo que fetichiza crianças são obviamente proibidos.

rules.text: Discurso de ódio
rules.hint: Aqui é proibido qualquer discurso de ódio ou seus derivados: machismo, misoginia, racismo, xenofobia, transfobia, homofobia, apologia a toda e qualquer forma de opressão, exploração e humilhação entre seres humanos. Apologia a governos autoritários, nacionalismo extremista.

rules.text: Nazismo e fascismo
rules.hint: É crime e é proibido aqui.

rules.text: Desinformação
rules.hint: Se for intencional, banimento imediato. Se for sem dolo, congelamento da conta por cinco dias. Com banimento se o comportamento continuar.

rules.text: Publicação de conteúdo privado
rules.hint: Também conhecido como doxxing, resulta em suspensão imediata.

rules.text: Ameaças
rules.hint: Toda publicação de ameaça é causa de banimento.

rules.text: Conteúdo violento ou chocante
rules.hint: Sempre com aviso de conteúdo (CW) e, caso tenha imagens, com aviso de imagem sensível. Dependendo do conteúdo, se não for uma denúncia válida e NECESSÁRIA - pode causar o banimento da conta.

rules.text: Política
rules.hint: Essa é uma instância política. O uso de CW é opcional e fica a cargo do usuário.

rules.text: Conversas privadas
rules.hint: É proibido o envio de DMs com conteúdo indesejável, incluindo imagens.

rules.text: Atitudes invasivas
rules.hint: Estão sujeitos à punição, que vai depender do nível de violência: comentários e/ou perguntas invasivas (ex. pedir a localização de alguém), assédio (continuar uma conversa que alguém não quer mais que continue).

rules.text: Assédio sexual
rules.hint: Banimento imediato. Outros comportamentos nocivos como piadas ou comentários sexuais receberão punições que podem variar dependendo da gravidade.

rules.text: Personificação e representação falsa
rules.hint: Contas criadas em nome de marcas ou celebridades devem ser sinalizadas como paródia.

rules.text: Flood na linha local ou global
rules.hint: Com conversas infinitas é um comportamento desencorajado. A continuidade pode levar à suspensão.

rules.text: Vídeos com luzes intermitentes
rules.hint: Use CW e aviso de conteúdo já que pode causar mal-estar e até convulsões em pessoas com epilepsia.

rules.text: Selfie
rules.hint: Algumas pessoas do espectro autista se incomodam com contato visual, se possível use CW ou marque como conteúdo sensível.

rules.text: Crossposts
rules.hint: Só podem ser usados na condição de que você acompanhe as suas notificações pelo menos com alguma regularidade; do contrário, resultará em suspensão após uma advertência.

rules.text: Crossposts (de terceiros)
rules.hint: A conta de origem do crosspost deve ser sua, e não de terceiros. Nesta instância não é permitida a criação de contas (bot) criadas exclusivamente para replicar conteúdos produzidos por terceiros.

rules.text: Uso de tóxicos
rules.hint: Recomendamos o CW e aviso de conteúdo sensível para a imagem.

rules.text: Fobia
rules.hint: Situações ou imagens que podem causar fobia, como bichos peçonhentos, imagens com vários buracos e similares, recomendamos o uso de CW e aviso de conteúdo sensível.

rules.text: Violência
rules.hint: Posts que descrevam cenas violentas, que falem em suicídio ou assassinato devem ter CW – isso quando for uma notícia. Se o usuário estiver ele/a mesmo falando de cometer qualquer um desses atos, o post será banido e se você estiver pensando em suicídio, ligue 188.

rules.text: Descrição de mídias
rules.hint: Você será orientade sobre ferramentas de descrição. Receberá dicas de apps. Ajuda individual em caso de problema físico. Será lembrade por um bot, caso se esqueça. Mas, se depois de tudo não descrever, terá sua conta congelada.

rules.text: Você deve ter 18 anos completos ou mais
rules.hint: A Ursal.Zone não trabalha com coleta de dados e temos políticas de uso de CW e ocultação de mídias impróprias para menores. Ao se cadastrar na Ursal.Zone, você atesta ser maior de idade, sujeito à suspensão da conta caso tenha menos de 18.
