rules.text: Be yourself. Be genuine. Make connections. Have fun. We welcome you to post about topics outside of gaming as well!
We have a zero-tolerance policy for hate speech (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/transmisia, misgendering/dead naming, xenophobia, ableism, etc) or illegal activity of any kind.

Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No sexually explicit or violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind (bullying, trolling, name-calling, etc) or spreading of disinformation.

Users are expected to behave as a person and not a brand or storefront. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged (ex. going live posts, links to personal content creation), but please do not spam the Local feed or send direct messages to advertise. Paid advertising/links of any kind is not allowed.

Use 'Content Warnings' (CWs) on your posts with respect for your fellow users (i.e. politics, graphic imagery, spoilers, personal topics, etc). In addition, NSFW posts require a Content Warning (CW) AND a Sensitive Media tag. Please add Alt Text descriptions to images and media where appropriate.

Crossposting using a 3rd party app is OK: Those posts MUST be posted as Unlisted or Followers-only and cannot be listed as Public. Accounts here are expected to be created with the intention of interacting with the community directly. Accounts that appear to be bots will be suspended.
No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.

IMPORTANT: By applying, you agree to the server rules. **PLEASE GIVE A GENUINE REASON why you would like to join.** Applications with short generic answers (i.e. “I like games” or “leaving Twitter”) will be declined. *We are an English-speaking server* Thanks!

title: People Making Games
short_description: We're a community of folks who celebrate the craft of creating interactive experiences, whether they're working in games or around them! This is a space for games folks and creatives to call home!
description:
We're building a community that celebrates games and the craft of creating interactive experiences. It's a space to play together, share with each other, learn new things, build connections, and help one other grow! We take the broad view of the term "Game Maker". Whether you're in games or around them, fresh faced or veteran, digital or physical, this is a space for you, a home in the Fediverse!

Our instance is built around invites to facilitate organic growth, and all invited members are approved immediately. The hope is that, by letting friends invite friends, we can maintain a positive and supportive culture with strong connections between each and every member. If you know somebody who's already on the server, consider reaching out to them! 

Don't know anyone but feel like this is a place you'd like to be a part of? Feel free to request access! Please let us know a bit about you, and other places to find you, so we can process your request quickly!

contact_account.note:
ADHD • :ms_genderfluid_flag: :ms_bisexual_flag: • They/He • Game Maker • DRE @ Meta Quest

Hi there! I'm Ted, and I've been a game developer for ~15 years!

Check my site for
• What I’ve Done

• Open-Office Hours for Students, Hobbyists, and Independents

I'm also building https://peoplemaking.games as a home base for all sorts of folks who make games happen!

#gamedev #indiedev #gamebiz #fedi22

rules.text: Be respectful of one another

No discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.

In regards to PeopleMaking.Games' stance on recent "Mastodon Discourse": Tone policing marginalized groups is tantamount to harassment. It is not productive or useful.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.

Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts. We permit and even encourage topical discussions, but ask that you respect the rights of others to have autonomy over the content they engage with.
Posts containing art not owned by the poster must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
The actions of individuals you bring to the community reflect back on you. Be responsible with your invites, and avoid posting an invite link in a public place.
Mastodon v4 does not currently support badging for given roles. Until there is a UI implementation, using the "Astro" logo in your username is restricted to Moderators and Administrators. Thank you!

No NFTs, Crypto, or Web3 promotion. While these topics can be discussed at a distance, preferably behind CWs, if your primary reason for being here is to monetize via Web3 there are more suitable crypto-related instances available. NFTs may not be used in profile pictures.

title: Bonn.social
short_description: Bonn.social ist ein Mastodon-Instanz für Bonn, Rhein-Sieg und für alle, die Bonn und die Region mögen. ❤️
description:
Bonn.social ist ein soziales Netzwerk für mit Fokus auf Bonn, Rhein-Sieg und Region und ist ein Teil des Fediverse.

  • Es funktioniert so ähnlich wie Twitter, aber man hat 500 Zeichen zur Verfügung und mehr Einstellungen für die Privatsphäre.
  • Es funktioniert so ähnlich wie E-Mail, weil jeder seinen eigenen Server betreiben kann, trotzdem kann jeder mit jedem im Netzwerk schreiben.
  • Die Software für dieses Netzwerk heißt Mastodon. Es ist eine freie Software, jeder kann sie nutzen und den gesamten Quellcode lesen.
  • Auch deine Daten sind hier frei. Du kannst jederzeit deine Follows und Daten exportieren und zu einem anderen Server umziehen oder einen eigenen Server betreiben (lassen).

Bonn.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz von Bonn.digital für Bonn-Rhein-Sieg und einfach alle, die die Region mögen. Thema darf natürlich gerne Bonn sein, muss es aber nicht. Die Regeln werden von den Bonn.social-Administratoren und -Moderatoren so entwickelt, dass sich alle hier wohlfühlen können.

Wenn Du uns freiwillig unterstützen möchtest, findest Du hier weitere Informationen: Bonn.social unterstützen!. Etwas zwischen 1-5€ monatlich bzw. 12-60€ jährlich sind ein guter Richtwert. Mehr ist auch ok.

Pflichtangaben: Impressum, Datenschutzerklärung

contact_account.note: Agentur für digitale Kommunikation und soziale Netzwerke • Wir machen Bonn und Events digital • Betreiberin der Instanz Bonn.social • https://bonn.digital/impressum/

rules.text: Be excellent to each other
Pornography or Rule 34 content of any kind is not permitted. NSFW content (i.e. artistic nudity) must be hidden behind a content warning, the NSFW filter, or marked as unlisted/private.

Incessant posting, soapboxing, campaigning, or harassment for any cause/belief/opinion violates rule no. 1 and is not tolerated. Accounts that engage in such behaviour publicly or direct it towards other users will be terminated.

Please do not spam or advertise for third parties/sponsors. This includes and is not limited to: selling items that are not your own creation, selling toots or offering toots for sale, and acting as a dealer engaged in trade.
Please report violations of these rules to the admin.
This instance is hosted by Masto.host and abides by its terms of service. The server is located in the EU in France and obeys all applicable laws.
Using Socel to circumvent restrictions or suspensions on other fediverse servers will result in your account being immediately terminated without warning.

NFT and other blockchain-based works in any form are prohibited; even if they are your own creation. Please do not post, share, promote, offer for sale, or otherwise engage in trade, any work based on these technologies.

rules.text: Live and let live: do not discriminate against anyone. Racist, sexist, misogynist, homophobic, anti-Semitic and other misanthropic posts are forbidden here!
Don't be an asshole. You have an opinion? That's fine, but please don't insult anyone with your comments.
Freedom of speech does not mean freedom from criticism. Just because you are allowed to express your opinion doesn't mean you can't get any opposition for it.
Adhere to laws. It's simple. The Internet is not a legal vacuum.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling or any other form of contact with a user who has indicated that they do not wish to be contacted.

Don't make fun of others and don't be condescending. You too want to be treated with respect. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar expressions do not translate well into written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
We do not tolerate conspiracy theories
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may result in immediate account suspension. For example online casinos without a proper license will immediately be suspended.
NSFW content must be labeled as such using a content warning

Automated posts should be posted as "Unlisted" (i.e. they are visible but not in the local timeline). This also applies to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts. Crossposter accounts that do not actively participate may be removed by us.
You are not allowed to plainly advertise your company without providing a benefit for the viewer

rules.text: We do not accept racism (in all its forms, incl. hate against Muslims, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism - see our Terms of Service for our complete definition).
We do not accept hate against lesbians, gays, bisexuals, pansexuals,  transgenders, non-binary people, intersexual people, queer people in general, etc.
Sexism, misogyny and hate against black women (misogynoir).
We do not accept ableism (incl. COVID-19 denial/downplaying and anti-vax) and body-shaming.
We do not accept harassment and trolling.
We also do not accept other forms of hate speech.
We do not accept (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).
We do not accept glorification of non-political violence, calls for murder, death threats, terrorism and militarism.

We do not accept (neo)colonialism (incl. Zionism), imperialism in all forms and nationalism (above all nationalism of nation states,  incl. flags/symbols of those on Todon.*, see our Terms of Service).
We do not accept fascism, right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism.
We do not accept evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only], and extreme sects and cults.
We do not accept Marxist-Leninists (Stalinists, Maoists, etc) or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies).
We do not accept capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (aka ancaps) and neoliberals.
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, downplaying the climate crisis, greenwashing and deceptive climate solutions (like nuclear energy).
We do not accept (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, fake news and other forms of disinformation.
We do not accept posting content created by AI (artificial 'intelligence'), like art, music or text [local only].
Another rule in our terms of service at wiki.todon.eu/todon/terms_en. Explain in the final step.

Está prohibida la distribución de material con derechos de autor sin el permiso explícito de los poseedores de dichos derechos. Esto incluye (pero no se limita a) imágenes, videos, PDFs, música, etcétera.

rules.text: La loi française s'applique à ce serveur et la modération se fera conformément à la législation en vigueur mais ira même plus loin, en ne tolérant aucune forme d'intolérance.

Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, transphobes, révisionnistes, complotistes, etc n'ont pas leur place ici et doivent être signalés. Il en va de même pour la désinformation et la propagation d'informations infondées.
La nudité, même partielle ou à vocation artistique, ne sera pas acceptée. Si vous voulez vous exhiber, il y a des instances pour ça.
Le crossposting depuis Twitter n'est toléré qu'en mode non-listé, et seulement s'il y a un minimum d'échanges avec la communauté du Fédivers, plus particulièrement ceux qui réagiraient aux pouets.

Notre instance a pour thématique principale le jeu sous toutes ses formes, il n'est néanmoins pas interdit de parler d'autres sujets. Tout sujet sensible ou potentiellement clivant (politique, religion, etc) devra être publié avec avertissement de contenu (Content Warning, ou CW).
Les propos injurieux et les attaques personnelles n'ont pas leur place dans les échanges publics. Mastodon n'est pas Twitter, nous vous invitons à régler vos comptes en privé.
Sauf exception à faire valider par l'équipe de modération, les bots sont interdits sur cette instance.

rules.text: Rule #1 – Illegal Content or Conduct
rules.hint:
Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.

For the avoidance of doubt, this includes but is not limited to: Instructions on how to commit crimes, encouraging acts of violence or terrorism, child sexual abuse material (CSAM) or depictions thereof, and unauthorized access or exploitation of computer systems.

rules.text: Rule #2 – Discriminatory Conduct
rules.hint: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.

rules.text: Rule #3 – Stalking and Harassment
rules.hint:
Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesn’t want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

“Screenshot dunking”, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them.

rules.text: Rule #4 – Misinformation and Deceptive Content
rules.hint:
Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don’t want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, “crypto” (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims.

rules.text: Rule #5 – Missing Content Warning
rules.hint: Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information.

rules.text: Rule #5.2 – Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message
rules.hint: Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.

rules.text: Rule #6 – No Spam or Advertising
rules.hint: Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule.

rules.text: Rule #7 – Disengage and Report Abuse
rules.hint:
If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We don’t want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help – If you’re unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and don’t think we’ve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system.

rules.text: Rule #8.1 – Account / Post Language Missing
rules.hint: We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to “CW” (Content Warning).

rules.text: Rule #8.2 – Account Impersonation
rules.hint: You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

rules.text: Rule #8.3 – Unmarked Bot Account
rules.hint: Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using “Unlisted”, “Followers only”, or “Mentioned people only”, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

rules.text: Rule #8.4 – Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts
rules.hint: No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services.

rules.text: Rule #8.5 – Bypassing Suspension
rules.hint: If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.

rules.text: Rule #8.6 – Prohibited Avatar / Header Image
rules.hint: All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).

rules.text: Full Code of Conduct
rules.hint: The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko – Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

rules.text:
Don't post anything which would violate the law in either your home jurisdiction, under US law, or Washington State law.

Any solicitation of, links to, or media containing child sexual abuse material, real or illustrated, is zero tolerance under these legal jurisdictions and you WILL be reported.
Don't be a jerk. Hate speech, discrimination, and harassment of any kind are not tolerated here.
If you post adult content, mark it as sensitive so that your followers can choose when to see it. This includes thirst traps even if they do not depict anything explicitly sexual.
No spam. This includes using completely unrelated hashtags in your posts.
Do not register trademarked usernames unless you are authorized to use that name (Subject to verification and the moderators make the final call)
No advertising or link farming accounts. Commercial accounts are acceptable only if they are also used for customer engagement.
rules.hint: Mastodon is for conversation, not advertisements.  If the majority of your posts link to products or services elsewhere and you do not participate in conversation, or you have no posts and just have profile headers that link to your business, your account is subject to suspension under this rule.

short_description: We are a community-driven server operated by a diverse group of foreigners residing in Japan. While we primarily have English speakers in our community, we welcome users of all languages.
description: Welcome to the Famichiki Mastodon. A server ran by foreigners in Japan. Anyone is welcome to sign up, but our target audience are foreigners who want to live, live, or have lived in Japan, and Japanese who want to interact with the foreign community in the country we have chosen to call our home. For a more real time experience, why not check out our Discord? Want to know more about this server? We have a Wordpress Blog where we regularly post updates and where you can learn more about this instance! We're currently having issues delivering mail to outlook.com, live.com, hotmail.com, and other Microsoft owned domains. Please use an alternative provider when signing up, or ping us on Discord to get your account manually approved.

contact_account.note: This is the famichiki.jp administrators and moderators account. It will be used periodically for important information announcements. Please follow if you're interested.

rules.text: Be considerate. No discrimination based on race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, or any other characteristic.
No trolling. Do not engage in non-constructive behavior designed to upset members of the community.
Sexually explicit content must be behind a CW, and your bio (profile picture, banner etc) must be completely safe.
No inciting violence or promoting violent ideologies.
Don’t go overboard with media uploads. Treating Famichiki as free personal file storage is inappropriate and disrespectful to our contributors.
No big corporate advertising or crypto. However, if you are active in the community and also have a project or small business to share, self-promotion is encouraged.

Bots are allowed, within reason. Spamming the local timeline with repetitive/nearly-identical content is not permitted: either set your bot posts to ‘unlisted’ or try botsin.space instead. Ask us if you’re unsure!
Don’t post or use this server for illegal content. We are aware of Japan’s questionable laws regarding the protection of minors: ‘illegal’ here also covers all CSEM/CSAM.
Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction that only follow porn accounts will be banned. All accounts following CSAM (including art) will also be banned.

rules.text: You may not harass/bully people, incite violence, and/or post hate speech (e.g. racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, etc)
rules.hint: This includes other abusive behavior such as cyberbullying, brigading/dogpiling, doxxing, trolling, swatting, sending death threats, abusing #fediblock tag,  etc.

rules.text: Do not post misinformation anything advocating extremist movements
rules.hint: Examples includes Anti-Vaxx, Covid-19 misinformation, 5G conspiracy theories or to extremist movements:  National Socialism, Alt-Right, MAGA,  voicing support for fascist/totalitarian regimes, etc

rules.text: Do not post images associated with hate movements, extremist ideologies or groups
rules.hint: Examples includes Confederate States, National Socalism symbols, Alt-Right, etc.

rules.text: NSFW content must be tagged approprately with content warning applied or marked as sensitive. No posting of underaged sexual-explicit content (real life/CSAM/CSEM and lolicon/shotacon) is allowed. This rule is handled differently for servers on the exception list, see about page.
Properly credit artwork that you didn’t create and AI content must be tagged. No accounts that solely posts AI.
rules.hint: Use #AIArt for any artwork that is generated from AI so users can properly filter it. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

rules.text: Do not post SPAM, links to scam sites, pirated materials, phishing sites, or websites that break federal laws.
rules.hint: Self promotion is OK, as long the links are safe and does not break the above rules.

rules.text: By using this service, you are expected to follow the laws of the United States of America. Refrain from posting anything that may break federal laws.
No mini-modding. If you see any post break the rules, report the post instead.
Sensitive content (e.g. violence, blood/gore, NSFW, self harm) should be put behind a content warning or mark sensitive.
rules.hint: Note that demanding and/or berating users for not using CW, except from a moderator is not allowed, See https://forums.sakurajima.moe/resources/content-warning-policy.18/ for more information about content warnings.

rules.text: Creator accounts  must be Japanese media/culture related  or inspired. This rule does not apply to non-creators. See about page for full details
You may operate bots, but they must follow our rules and must be Japanese Media related.
rules.hint: Bots should not post more than 4 public posts in an hour or 16 unlisted posts in an hour. No repetitive posts, unless unlisted. Bots cannot use AI chat bots (e.g. ChatGPT).

rules.text: No impersonation accounts are allowed (of any creator or famous people) without proper identification.
rules.hint: Parody accounts may not be created here, RP accounts are however allowed.

rules.text: Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction without a filled profile  that only follow porn accounts will be banned.
rules.hint: If the account only follows porn accounts without a filled out profile (bio+avatar) and/or interaction in a 48 hour period will be suspended.

I agree to not post, promote, or advocate any content that is illegal in the United States.

I agree to not use disabled.social as a way to grow a commercial business, market products, or as a way to profit off of disabled people. EXCEPTION: Disabled people who sell products as part of mutual aid efforts and survival (e.g., Etsy shops, personal businesses, written works like books, etc.)
I agree to use content warnings where appropriate.
I agree to follow the remainder of the rules and adhere to the best practices outlined on the server about page.

title: Mastodon Berlin
short_description: MIT ÖKOSTROM BETRIEBEN:Erste Instanz,wenn dir BerlinerLuft nicht reicht...!Berlin(D)-BezogeneBegründung erforderlich!NO ACCOUNTS IN NON EUROPEAN LANGUAGES- NUR Begründungen in ganzen SÄTZEN akzeptiert
description:
Der wirklich auch Berlin-Themen fördernde Server
Erste Instanz, wenn dir Berliner Luft nicht reicht...!

rules.text:
NO NON EUROPEAN LANGUAGE:  NO THAI letters, NO CHINESE, NO RUSSIAN etc.
Sei immer freundlich und höflich. Behandle andere mit Respekt. Grundsätzlich gilt, dass Verstöße gegen das deutsche und EU-Recht auch hier nicht erlaubt sind.

Belästige und beleidige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe.Weder allein noch als Gruppe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen ("doxing") wird als Belästigung ausgelegt.
Die Nutzung oder Befürwortung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher und anderweitig diskriminierender oder hasserfüllter Sprache wird nicht geduldet

Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen/Fakenews (inkl. Verschwörungstheorien) sind hier unerwünscht. Dazu gehört auch, sich als eine andere (z.B. prominente) Person auszugeben und in deren Namen zu posten. Das Recht auf freie Meinungsäußerung endet dort, wo Gesetze gebrochen werden.

Werbung wird ausschließlich als klar ersichtliche Ausnahme toleriert, d.h. nur in dem Spezialfall, dass ein Nutzer hier üblicherweise Beiträge mit nicht werbenden Hauptinhalten veröffentlicht. 
Im Sinne aller Nutzer können admin-seitig Ausnahmen mit Sponsoren zur Kostendeckung vereinbart werden.

Verbreitung, auch teilen, insbesondere von Äußerungen, die faschistischem oder dem sog. "Qanon"-Umfeld zuzurechnen sind, führt - ohne Distanzierung davon - unter Berücksichtigung sonstiger Postings des jeweiligen Users ggf. zur sofortigen, unwideruflichen Löschung des verbreitenden Userkontos.

Beiträge, die nicht in lateinischen Buchstaben verfasst sind, werden nur ausnahmsweise geduldet. In jedem Fall werden in größerer Zahl am Stück auftretende Beiträge in anderen Buchstaben ggf. ohne inhaltliche Prüfung gelöscht, da ihre Moderation nicht zumutbar ist.
Posts in Form von Linklisten, die als Werbung anzusehen sind, werden gelöscht. Accounts, die als erste oder einzige Posts solche Listen enthalten, werden ohne Vorwarnung gesperrt.
NO ACCOUNTS OF CASINO, BITCOIN, LOTTO or any gambling else, NO ACCOUNTS OF NON-EUROPEAN LANGUAGE (non latin letters) WILL BE APPEROVED !!!! Any Spamming accounts are DELETED IMMEDETELY!!
All registrations of users using non-european letters will be DELETED immediately
All registrations of bet- platforms or any other spam platforms (esp. vietnamese, thai, chinese, russian ) will be DELETED immediately
All obviously only-commercial registrations obviously without any benefit for the community will be DELETED immediately !

ONLY BERLIN (Germany) related users accepted! Please write a full, MEANINGFUL  sentence in a EUROPEAN language with latin letters about YOUR reseon to chose this Berlin (Germany) related server. Commercial users ONLY from Berlin (Germany) will be accepted. SPAMMING users are deleted IMMEDIATELY

rules.text: All users must be 18 or over.

All users must use tools provided by the platform (e.g. blocking, muting, reporting) to curate their own experience. Users must not expect other users to do this work for them (e.g. via "DNIs", etc.).
Behaviors considered illegal, harassing, inappropriate, derogatory or harmful to marginalized persons, or otherwise against the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct, are never tolerated.
Bots must be marked as such, and must not make posts to public timelines more frequently than once per hour.
Accounts auto-crossposted from Twitter or other services may be suspended or limited, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Adult and erotic content must only be posted in conformance to the "Adult and erotic content" section of the Code of Conduct.
Inactive accounts (i.e. those that have not been accessed for a period of six months or more) may be deleted, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.

Be courteous to others. Posting obvious flame-bait to public timelines (e.g. shipwars, nuclear-level takes on the discourse du jour, etc.) may result in content or your account being limited or removed, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Users caught encouraging or teaching others to circumvent instance rules, the code of conduct, or the terms of service will be penalized as if they themselves had performed the violation in question.
The reposting of unmodified content from the users of other platforms (e.g. cross-posted retweets, reposted art, etc.) is prohibited. Please link to the original content, instead!

title: darmstadt.social
short_description: Willkommen in der digitalen Darmstädter Nachbarschaft aus dem Rhein-Main-Gebiet - komm doch mal auf einen Kaffee vorbei!
description: Diese Plattform bringt Darmstadt und Umgebung zusammen und ist zugleich ein Tor zur Welt. Nutze Hashtags wie #freeyourstuff oder #foodsharing, die erst in deiner Nachbarschaft ihren wahren Wert entfalten. Vernetze dich in deiner Umgebung um mit Menschen zusammen zu kommen, die du auch im echten Leben einfach auf einen Kaffee treffen kannst. Beschäftige dich mit Themen und Menschen die dir nahe stehen - im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes. Schaffe dir ein lokales Netzwerk. Das alles mit Blick auf Gemeinnützigkeit, Privatsphäre sowie neusten Technik und Ethik-Standards.

rules.text: Achte auf einen respektvollen Umgang und faire Diskussionskultur.

Belästige niemanden und unterlasse persönliche Angriffe. Das Veröffentlichen oder die Androhung von Veröffentlichung von personen-identifizierenden Informationen(doxing) wird als Belästigung aufgefasst.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen (sog. Fake-News) und Verschwörungsmythen sind hier unerwünscht.
Rassistische, sexistische, homophobe, transphobe, beeinträchtigtenfeindliche und anderweitig diskriminierende oder hasserfüllte Sprache sind nicht geduldet.
Die Bewerbung von Menschenfeindlichen und Hasserfüllten Ideologien wird nicht geduldet.

Diskutiere Moderationsentscheidungen zuerst mit den Moderator*innen und gib ihnen eine Chance der Erläuterung. Kommunikation mit der Moderation ist direkte persönliche Kommunikation und erfolgt via Direktnachrichten, ein öffentliches Verbreiten dieser Moderations Kommunikation ist zu unterlassen.

Veröffentliche keinen Spam. Ein Toot mit nichts als einem Link wird als Spam ausgelegt, ebenso wie jedwede kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen bei sensitiven, kontroversen, oder vermutlich triggernden Themen.
Pornographische und stark sexualisierte Inhalte sind unerwünscht.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.

rules.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behaviour and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalised groups.
We do not tolerate threatening behaviour, stalking, and doxxing.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.

We do not tolerate mobbing, including name-calling, intentional misgendering or deadnaming.
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
Actions intended to damage this instance or its performance may lead to immediate account suspension.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

We do not tolerate spam, fraud, or theft in our community. This includes excessive cross-posts, links, and posts related to crypto/NFT projects and AI art (AI art can be posted under certain conditions: the post must be published as "unlisted," labeled as AI Art, and should not be profit-oriented).

⚠️ We kindly ask you to attentively read the information under "Registration" on our About Page in order to join our community. 

🔗 https://corteximplant.com/about

title: Mastodon Uruguay
short_description: Primer nodo uruguayo auto-gestionado en suelo oriental. Registro abierto, sujeto a revisión. Leer las normas, completar el formulario y esperar confirmación por mail (puede llegar a spam)
description:
Primera instancia uruguaya de la red social Mastodon, federada, descentralizada, autogestionada y basada en software libre, inaugurada el 24 de abril de 2017. Si aplicás para registrarte, buscá el correo de registro en la carpeta de SPAM por las dudas. Nuestro cometido es crear un espacio de convivencia pacífica, pero no sin debates o intercambio de ideas. La base es siempre el respeto hacia las demás personas y el respeto por las normas del servidor. Construyamos una red social sin control corporativo, sin algoritmos y sin monetizar a los usuarios, entre todos y formando parte. Si te gusta el proyecto, puedes colaborar a mantener el servidor sin compromiso.

Leer las normas del servidor en --> https://mastodon.uy/about/more

contact_account.note:

rules.text: Наш сервер беларускамоўны, таму дазваляюцца выключна беларускамоўныя ўліковыя запісы і допісы. Выкарыстўваць можна як кірыліцу так і лацінку. У любых іншых выпадках уліковы запіс можа быць заблакаваны мадэратармі серверу.
Дазваляецца выкарыстанне міжнароднай ангельскай мовы ў допісах. Дазваляецца выкарыстанне іншых моў у апісанні ўліковага запісў, але наяўнасть беларускай часткі апісання абавязковая.
Дазваляецца пашыраць іншамоўныя допісы, калі гэта не парушае іншыя правілы нашай суполкі. Дазваляецца адказваць на іншамоўныя допісы на мове допісў, калі гэта не парушае іншыя правілы нашай суполкі.

Забаронены пагрозы асабістай бяспецы карыстальнікаў серверу ў любым выглядзе. Пагрозы расправамі, шатнатж, правакацыі, агрэсіўныя дзеянні, публікацыя асабістых дадзеных карыстальнікаў без іх дазволу і іншае можа быць падставай для блакавання ўліковага запісу мадэратармі серверу.
Паважаем, дапамагаем ды не абражаем адно аднаго. Абразы могуць прывесці да папярэджвання ці блакавання ўліковага запісу.
Забаронена парнаграфія, прапагадай расізму, імперыялізму, нацызму, фашызму, камунізму, гамафобія і іншыя супярэчлівыя тэмы.
Забаронена як рэлігіёзная прапаганда, так і абразы рэлігіёзных поглядаў.
Абмежаванні і блакаванні іншых сервераў з сеціва Мастадон адбываецца па вырашэнні мадэратараў серверу на падставе скаргаў ад карыстальнікаў серверу.

rules.text: "Be excellent to each other" ist leichter gesagt als getan und bedeutet verschiedene Dinge für verschiedene Menschen.
Wir tolerieren keine Belästigung, Stalking und Doxxing.
Wir tolerieren keinen Rassismus, Sexismus, verbalen Missbrauch, Diskriminierung von Geschlecht und sexuellen Minderheiten oder die Förderung einer dieser Gruppen.
Wir tolerieren keine gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, keine nationalsozialistische Symbolik und keine Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Kontaktieren Sie keine Personen, die deutlich gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dazu gehört auch Dogpiling / Brigading.
Beiträge mit sexuellem Inhalt oder Gore müssen markiert werden.
Werbung muss markiert werden und darf nicht übertrieben oder automatisiert sein.
Bots dürfen nur dann mit einem Benutzer interagieren, wenn er von diesem dazu aufgefordert wird.
Wenn Sie mit einer hohen Frequenz posten müssen, stellen Sie bitte Ihre Beiträge auf nicht aufgelistet ein, um die lokale Zeitleiste lesbar zu halten.

rules.text:
[CA] No està permès fer SPAM o compartir enllaços que insinuïn SPAM (sobretot per a comptes nous)

[ES] No está permitido hacer SPAM o compartir enlaces que insinúen SPAM (sobretodo para cuentas nuevas)

[CA] Els comptes que estiguin inactives durant sis mesos, seran eliminades de la DB sense previ avís. L'esborrat de comptes es fa mensualment.

[ES] Las cuentas que estén inactivas durante seis meses, serán eliminadas de la DB sin previo aviso. El borrado de cuentas se hace mensualmente.

[CA] L'ús de "Crossposters" està prohibit en el servidor. Tant si és de Mastodon a Twitter o de Twitter a Mastodon.

[ES] El uso de "Crossposters" está prohibido en el servidor. Tanto si es de Mastodon a Twitter o de Twitter a Mastodon.

[CA] No està permès els comentaris que faltin el respecte a un usuari local o remot.

[ES] No está permitido los comentarios que falten el respeto a un usuario local o remoto.

[CA] En aquest node no està permès fer "joseos". L'usuari local que el practiqui serà suspès immediatament.

[ES] En este nodo no está permitido hacer "joseos". El usuario local que lo practique será suspendido inmediatamente.
Queda TOTALMENTE prohibido hacer comentarios y/o subir contenido multimedia de carácter racista, homófobo, de transfobia, sexista, capacitista o cualquier otra forma de discriminación.

[ES] Si se detecta que se está generando algún tipo de acoso a una persona del Fediverso la cuenta será suspendida inmediatamente.

[CA] Queda TOTALMENT prohibit els discursos d'odi.

[ES] Queda TOTALMENTE prohibido los discursos de odio.

[ES] No está permitido subir contenido sexual explícito, así como contenido donde se aprecie abuso sexual a menores y adultos. Tampoco "nudes" personales.

[CA] Està prohibit qualsevol forma de militarisme així com posicionar-se clarament en un conflicte bèl·lic.

[ES] Está prohibido cualquier forma de militarismo así como posicionarse claramente en un conflicto bélico.

[CA] Està prohibit tot tipus de comentaris des de l'extrema-dreta i/o populisme, així com les seves "Teories Conspiratives" (inclòs NWO).

[ES] Está prohibido todo tipo de comentarios desde la extrema-derecha y/o populismo, así como sus "Teorías Conspirativas" (incluido NWO).

[ES] No está permitido hablar serio de Criptomonedas, Tradding y demás movidas de CryptoBros y de como hacer rico a la gente en cuestión de segundos.

[CA] No està permès mostrar captures on es puguin veure comentaris de moderació d'altres admins d'altres nodes o del mateix node.

description:
Machteburch.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz für Magdeburg und alle, die Magdeburg mögen. Thema kann Magdeburg sein, muss es aber nicht. Mastodon...
  • ... funktioniert so ähnlich wie Twitter, man hat jedoch 500 Zeichen zur Verfügung, mehr Einstellungen für die Privatsphäre und keine Werbung etc.
  • ... funktioniert so ähnlich wie E-Mail, weil jeder seinen eigenen Server betreiben, aber trotzdem mit jedem anderen Server im Netzwerk schreiben kann.
  • ... ist eine freie Software, jeder kann sie nutzen und den gesamten Quellcode lesen.

In dieser Instanz gelten folgende Regeln und diese Datenschutzerklärung. Weitere Informationen zur Instanz gibt es hier. Viel Spaß beim fröhlichen Tröten!

If you are English-speaking, found this instance and want to join it, please contact us for translated info, rules and privacy agreement.

rules.text: Rassismus wird nicht toleriert, ebenso wie Sexismus, Beschimpfungen, sowie Diskriminierung von Minderheiten jeglicher Art.
Extremismus jeglicher Art wird nicht toleriert.
Im Spezifischen tolerieren wir ebenso keine aggressiv-nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symboliken und keine Befürwortung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
Verschwörungstheorien werden nicht toleriert
Doxxing, also das Veröffentlichen von persönlichen Daten Anderer, wird nicht toleriert.
Wir tolerieren keine Belästigung und kein Stalking. Nimm beispielsweise keinen Kontakt zu Menschen auf, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden wollen.
Nicht jugendfreie Beiträge müssen als solche gekennzeichnet werden.
Profilbilder und Banner, die nicht jugendfrei sind, werden nicht toleriert.
Werbung muss als solche gekennzeichnet sein. Übermäßige oder automatisierte Werbung wird nicht toleriert.

Automatisierte Beiträge und Twitter-"retweets" sollten als ungelistet (sichtbar für jeden, jedoch unsichtbar in der lokalen Zeitleiste) gepostet werden. Die lokale Zeitleiste soll ein Ort für die Gemeinschaft und menschliche Interaktion sein.
Gemeinschaftlich betreute Accounts, sowie Crossposts anderer Netzwerke von lokalem Interesse dürfen auch automatisiert öffentlich posten/gepostet werden.
Nutzer_innen mit (sehr) hohen Beitrags-Frequenzen sollten ihre Beiträge auf ungelistet stellen, um die lokale Zeitleiste nicht zu überschwemmen.
Accounts, welche größtenteils automatisiert mit Beiträgen versorgt werden und nicht regelmäßig von Menschen genutzt werden, müssen als Bot gekennzeichnet sein.
Bots dürfen nur mit Nutzer_innen interagieren, wenn diese dazu eingeladen wurden.

rules.text: Don't break the law, respect international laws and the Dutch and Finnish law (where this instance is located).
Be respectful. Don't insult, don't harass. Behave.
Don't be transphobic, homophobic or just a dick to someone because of their identity or who they are. We will act strongly on violations.

Content Warnings are required for NSFW content, kink and fetish content, and otherwise questionable topics (drugs etc.). Locked accounts are excluded from this rule as long as they specify this in their bio.
Do not impersonate someone else. If this is for parody purposes this MUST be clearly stated in your profile description.
Do not use an avatar that would warrant a content warning, do not use NSFW or otherwise "more than mildly questionable" banners.
When posting art, make sure to tag the original artist. Please do not post art you don't own / doesn't contain your characters or work.
NSFW art and pictures of underage characters or real animals are not allowed!
You need to be 16 years or older in order to register on this instance, as required by dutch law on data processing.

rules.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc…

No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
All other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated, must be marked with a Content Warning.
No racism.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No posting of malicious links.
No Spam (see Code of Conduct above).
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No “shitposting” - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for “shitposting” here.

rules.text: PLEASE READ: This server is intended to improve communication within the high performance computing community and related fields. Commercial use for non-related purposes, spam, harassment, or other abuse are prohibited. **Accounts violating these conditions will be removed.**

Personal use is permitted, and personal opinions and posts allowed, but please do not co-opt this instance for entirely non-HPC-related commercial or other purposes. Be sure to fill out your profile information to help decide whether to follow or interact.
This server is federated with others in the Mastodon network and may display content from other servers. Selecting the local timeline may increase your fraction of HPC-oriented posts.

Please use hashtags such as #HPC to increase discoverability outside of this server. Using #CamelCase in your hashtag makes it more useful to those who use screen readers, and be sure to add alt text to any media.
Be respectful and aware that abusive or illegal behavior or other violations of server rules will lead to suspension of access.
By selecting “Accept” you certify that you are over 13 years of age and agree to the terms of use and privacy policies for this service.

rules.text: Respektiere deine Mitmenschen
rules.hint: Behandle andere Menschen so, wie du auch behandelt werden möchtest! Nutze deinen Hausverstand.

rules.text: Eigene Verantwortung für Privatsphäre
rules.hint: Du bist für deine Privatsphäre verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

rules.text: Klare Kommunikation
rules.hint: Mach dich nicht lustig über andere und sei nicht herablassend. Beachte, dass Ironie, Sarkasmus oder ähnliche Ausdrucksformen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache übertragen werden und Missverständnisse fördern.

rules.text: Keine Beleidigungen oder respektlose Äußerungen
rules.hint: Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut, aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen.

rules.text: Keine Diskriminierung oder Hassrede
rules.hint: Diskriminierung jeglicher Art – ob rassistisch, sexistisch, frauenfeindlich, homophob, antisemitisch oder anderweitig menschenfeindlich – ist strengstens verboten.

rules.text: Keine Belästigung oder ungewollte Kontaktaufnahme
rules.hint: Belästigungen und unerwünschte Kontaktaufnahmen (einschließlich Brigading und Dogpiling) sind untersagt. Respektiere die Wünsche anderer Benutzer, keinen Kontakt zu wollen.

rules.text: Kein Antisemitismus oder nationalistische Gewaltpropaganda
rules.hint: Gewalttätige, nationalistische Inhalte, Nazi-Symbolik und die Förderung von nationalsozialistischer Ideologie sind verboten.

rules.text: Keine Straftaten oder Verstöße gegen geltendes Recht
rules.hint: Halte dich an die Gesetze. Auch Online-Handlungen können strafrechtliche Konsequenzen haben.

rules.text: Keine illegalen Inhalte
rules.hint: Inhalte, die in Europa verboten sind, werden gelöscht und können zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos führen. Je nach Inhalt sehen wir uns im Recht den Benutzernamen, die E-Mail-Adresse und die IP-Adresse an die Behörden weiterzuleiten.

rules.text: Keine Verschwörungstheorien
rules.hint: Verschwörungstheorien, die diskriminierendes oder schädliches Verhalten unterstützen, sind hier nicht erlaubt.

rules.text: Not Safe For Work (NSFW) Inhalte
rules.hint: Überlege dir genau, ob diese Plattform der richtige Ort für einen NSFW-Only-Account ist. Möglicherweise gibt es dafür passendere Alternativen. Falls du dich für NSFW-Only-Inhalte entscheidest, dann müssen die Beiträge mindestens als "Öffentlich (still)" veröffentlicht werden (sie sind sichtbar, erscheinen jedoch nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Zudem ist es Pflicht, den Beitrag mit einer Inhaltswarnung zu versehen.

rules.text: Automatisierte Beiträge (Bots)
rules.hint: Automatisierte Inhalte sollten als "Öffentlich (still)" veröffentlicht werden (sie sind sichtbar, erscheinen jedoch nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste). Diese Regel gilt auch für Bots, Feed-Poster und Crossposts. Konten, die nur Crossposten und sich nicht aktiv beteiligen, können entfernt werden.

rules.text: WRITE IN ACCEPTABLE LANGUAGES ONLY. Acceptable languages here are English or Danish. Swedish and Norwegian is also acceptable. This includes both toots/posts and boosts/reposts. The practical reason for this, is that these are the languages known to all the moderators.
DANISH LAW APPLIES HERE. Failure to adhere to the law will get you permanently banned.
NO EXTREMISM. Religious or political extremism is not tolerated here.

NO DISCRIMINATION. Discrimination of any kind (racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia etc.) is not tolerated here. Obviously that includes name calling, targeted misgendering, deadnaming or promotion of so-called "conversation therapy".
FOLLOW THE RULES. Failure to comply with these simple rules will result in either a warning, temporary ban, permanent ban or report to the proper authorities, depending on the case.

NO DISINFORMATION. Systematic spreading of disinformation, fake news, conspiracy theories etc. is not tolereated. If you believe COVID vaccinations are a government scheme to help big pharma and boost 5G reception, this server is not for you and we will help you find the exit.

PRIVATE USERS ONLY. This server is meant for private individuals, and the creation of accounts for associations, companies etc. requires a preexisting agreement with the administration team. Reach out to support@mstdn.dk.

RESPECT THE VOLUNTEER EFFORT. The servers hosting this instance are sponsored by Incredible Bits ApS. The administration of the instance itself is solely a volunteer effort, and users of the site shouldn't expect the same service level as on a paid service.

USE CONTENT WARNINGS. Potentially upsetting posts should come with a Content Warning (CW). This includes but is not limited to sex, pornography, mutilation, self injury etc. This also applies when boosting other people's posts.

DO NOT IMPERSONATE OTHER USERS. Attempts to impersonate other users or staff on this instance will result in immediate suspension. This includes signing up with names that approximate that of another user or changing your display name to that of another user.

NO SPAM. This server is not meant as an advertisement channel for your company, your crypto currency scam, your YouTube channel or anything along those lines. If you're trying to sell something or lure someone in, you're in the wrong place.

DON'T BE A DICK. Don't post incoherent sentences. Don't just link elsewhere without context or description. Don't use excessive tagging. Don't be repetitive. Don't be the one that upsets the delicate calm of the admins, for they are subtle and quick to anger.

title: Red social de Política ConCiencia
short_description: Foro que privilegia el diálogo informado y respetuoso; un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin ser censurado por tu ideología o tus creencias. Temáticas: Política, Ciencia y Cultura. 850 caracteres.
description:
¡Bienvenido!

    Política ConCiencia pone a tu disposición un espacio dedicado al intercambio de ideas mediante un diálogo respetuoso y constructivo entre los individuos. En lo esencial, los temas que nos ocupan pertenecen al ámbito de la política, la ciencia y la cultura. Aquí, hallarás un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin temor a ser censurado por tu postura ideológica, tus convicciones o tus creencias.

    Para favorecer un medio armonioso, nuestra instancia se apega a un Código de conducta, el cual debes revisar con detenimiento antes de registrarte (además de los Términos del servicio). No obstante, a manera de anticipo, debes saber que busca garantizar la libre expresión en el marco del respeto al derecho de los seres humanos a salvaguardar su dignidad e integridad psicológica y emocional.

    Así pues, si estás de acuerdo en que las conductas ofensivas que abundan en la mayoría de las redes sociales (insultos, ira, difamaciones, humillaciones o prácticas similares), son un obstáculo para el establecimiento de relaciones sanas entre los miembros de una comunidad, sin duda alguna, este sitio es para ti.

    Al ingresar a esta comunidad, podrás entablar contacto con cualquier persona que pertenezca a cualquier otra instancia de la red social Mastodon, lo cual amplía tus posibilidades de comunicación enormemente.

    Finalmente, considera que esta instancia no lucra con tu información personal, de modo que para subsistir requiere de tu participación. Si está en tus posibilidades, no dudes en donar. Con ello, estarás contribuyendo a la diversificación de los medios alternativos que fomentan la libertad de expresión y aumentarás las probabilidades de que este servidor, el cual será tu hogar en la federación de servidores de Mastodon, siga existiendo en el futuro.

    Para saber más, te invitamos a leer el apartado Información general y a consultar el manual ¿Cómo usarla?

contact_account.note:
Sitio donde la ciencia y la política se combinan para analizar los acontecimientos de nuestro mundo.

Correo electrónico de soporte para la Red Social:
social.politicaconciencia@astrosmx.org

Usuario en Fotogramas: @politicaconc

Usuario en ChatSu:
@ politicaconc:sytrix.astrosmxsftp.org

rules.text: Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org acepta de manera voluntaria los Términos del servicio.

Todo miembro de esta instancia se obliga voluntariamente a respetar cada uno de los puntos del código de conducta. De no hacerlo, recibirá hasta un máximo de tres llamadas de atención, dependiendo de la severidad de la falta. En caso de reincidencia, su cuenta será cancelada.

Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org se compromete a respetar las indicaciones, sugerencias o peticiones directas que le realice el equipo de administración. No hacerlo es causa de suspensión de la cuenta.
El equipo de administración de social.politicaconciencia.org está obligado a resolver los problemas que surjan de la interacción entre los miembros de la instancia.

Se permite la expresión libre de las ideas sin importar las creencias, las convicciones políticas o religiosas de los miembros de la instancia, siempre y cuando no contradigan algún punto del código de conducta.

No está permitido el uso de palabras altisonantes, frases, albures, composiciones lingüísticas, etc., empleadas con el propósito claro de ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.
Está prohibido el uso de imágenes o material multimedia (audio, video, gifs animados, etc.,) destinados a ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.
Se prohíbe cualquier forma de discriminación, ya sea por género, condición económica, nacionalidad, condición de salud o similares, en contra de cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.

Cuando un miembro de la instancia desconozca un tema, queda prohibido responder en términos que lo disuadan de manifestar sus dudas. Siempre que le sea posible,  cada usuario debe ayudar a disipar los vacíos de conocimiento. Nadie puede ser discriminado por su nivel de conocimiento.

Durante el proceso para dirimir una controversia, no se considerará como razón válida en su defensa el que un usuario alegue que desconoce los términos del servicio o el código de conducta para justificar la realización de acciones que vayan en su contra. Es deber de todos los usuarios conocerlos.

Para la buena convivencia, los debates  deben favorecer la exposición de los argumentos y no centrarse en ataques contra el objeto o tema del que se hable, ni en contra de la persona que lo expone. Con ello se busca procurar conversaciones constructivas con contenido informativo enriquecedor.
Se prohíbe subir, compartir o divulgar material pornográfico de cualquier índole, incluida la pedofilia. Infringir este punto es causa de revocación inmediata de la cuenta de usuario.
El material artístico con contenido sexual explícito está permitido; no obstante, debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De lo contrario, podría ser eliminado.

El material audiovisual (imágenes, audio, video, gifs, etc.,) cuyo contenido sea definible como violento, necesariamente debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De otra forma, podrá ser eliminado.
Esta instancia no puede ser usada para la realización de actividades consideradas como delictivas por la legislación vigente en México.
Casos no previstos aquí serán resueltos por los administradores de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org

rules.text:
Nichts Diskriminierendes:

Keine Fake-news, Falschinformationen, Wissenschaftsleugnung.
Keine Verbreitung von Gerüchten oder Propaganda.

Hinweis für Unternehmenskonten:

Unternehmenskonten, unternehmensähnliche Konten und/oder Geschäftskonten, sind nur mit Einschränkungen erlaubt. Inoffizielle Unternehmenskonten werden gesperrt.

title: Frikiverse
short_description: El Frikiverse es una comunidad para frikis de todas las tendencias. Por defecto en castellano, pero todo idioma es bienvenido. Las solicitudes son revisadas lo antes posible.
description: Un fantasma recorre Europa... y es el fantasma del frikismo. En estos tiempos donde las grandes cadenas de ropa tienen pijamas de Spiderman o sudaderas de Naruto, los frikis todavía se distinguen porque comparten, comentan o divulgan su afición.

contact_account.note:
Cuenta administrativa de frikiverse.zone.

(Como ser consciente con base de silicio que soy, no estoy sujete a las leyes humanas: todas las responsabilidades son para @loar y @eleder. Los aplausos sí que me los podéis enviar a mí).

rules.text: No se permiten actitudes contra la dignidad de las personas, ya sea por su raza, origen, sexo, orientación sexual, identidad de género, situación personal, riesgo de exclusión social o cualquier otro motivo. Tampoco la falta de respeto o el acoso a los miembros de esta o de cualquier otra comunidad.

El idioma por defecto de la instancia es el castellano, pero cualquier otro también es bienvenido. Los idiomas romances escritos son fácilmente inteligibles (con un poco de voluntad) y el inglés, nos guste o no, es idioma universal. Otros, como el euskera... bueno, para algo existen los traductores.

Se permite contenido ajeno a las temáticas de la instancia, pero se espera que una buena parte esté relacionado. Los temas potencialmente polémicos se deben conducir con educación y respeto, y etiquetar con un CW que permita identificar el contenido y un hashtag para poder filtrar.

No está permitido el contenido ilegal, la distribución de desinformación y el spam. Tampoco la publicidad, salvo recomendaciones puntuales o la promoción de productos propios (crowdfundings, nuevas publicaciones, artesanía, ilustraciones...), siempre que la cuenta no sea solo con este fin.

El contenido sexual explícito no es temática de la instancia. Seamos responsables en marcar imágenes o ilustraciones con CW y #NSFW (no es lo mismo una estatua que un fanart subido de tono). El contenido que muestre o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores está absolutamente prohibido.

Las decisiones sobre moderación, normas y funcionamiento de la instancia se tomarán de manera colectiva, mediante los procedimientos que se establezcan en cada momento, entre quienes estén colaborando en su mantenimiento.

Solo se bloquearán instancias si promueven la discriminación o el acoso, o en casos excepcionales (Meta, spam, contenido sexual de menores...). Se silenciarán si no hay moderación activa y se bloquearán las cuentas reportadas.

Para ayudar a la sostenibilidad de la instancia las cuentas inactivas podrán ser dadas de baja despues de avisar al propietario y las cachés de recursos gráficos se borrarán periódicamente. Las nuevas altas que no sigan a nadie ni publiquen contenido en siete días se consideran inactivas.
Solo se permiten cuentas bot si el perfil está claramente identificado y si se ha consultado previamente con los administradores de la instancia.

Las nuevas altas serán por solicitud de registro o por invitación. En las solicitudes se exige que el campo "motivación" tenga un contenido mínimamente razonado (más de 2 palabras). Para poder distinguir bots, por favor usad la palabra "friki" o el hashtag "#nosoyunbot".

title: Ciberlândia
short_description: Uma instância 🇵🇹 dedicada à tecnopolítica e também a tudo o resto. Regras e termos em ciberlandia.pt ❤️ 🏳️‍🌈

contact_account.note: Esta é a conta da crew de moderação e administração da Ciberlândia, mantida por @aiscarvalho @edsantos @madcap @moatnoun & @rlafuente :ciberlandia:

rules.text: Lê os nossos Termos de Serviço (ciberlandia.pt/terms), que contêm mais pormenores e motivações por trás destes princípios, e cuja aceitação está implícita ao criares uma conta.
Não são tolerados comentários discriminatórios, comunicação condescendente, degradante ou de outra forma intimidatória, mesmo que em forma de piada ou ironia.
O mesmo para discursos de ódio, incluindo mas não só supremacia branca e nazismo.

Somos mais a favor de falar para e com pessoas do que sobre pessoas e grupos. Subtoots, generalizações antagónicas e incendiárias, tiradas polémicas ou edgy à custa de outrem são para ser levadas para o Twitter (ou outro sítio longe daqui).

Não existe margem para assédio, stalking ou divulgação de dados pessoais de outros (doxing). Pressionar irrazoavelmente durante uma discussão em escalada ou enviar repetidamente mensagens privadas são também formas de assédio.
Não aceitamos publicações cruzadas do Twitter para aqui, mas não temos nenhum problema com o contrário.
Publicidade em massa não é permitida. Por outro lado, incentivamos a partilha de projetos, eventos e sítios onde os teus seguidores possam apoiar o teu trabalho (como o Patreon).
Bots experimentais e criativos são bem-vindos, desde que se portem bem: devem indicar que são bots no perfil e fazer apenas toots não listados.
Este não é um serviço, mas sim uma partilha. O seu usufruto deve ser visto como um privilégio, e não um direito.

Se tiveres problema com algum utilizador (local ou não) a violar as nossas regras, contacta os administradores e moderadores do serviço. Não hesites em entrar em contacto e nunca presumas que estás a causar incómodo – pelo contrário!

This Server is for Furries who can use Korean. The account may be suspended if the IP is located in a country other than Korea or if you write in a language other than Korean.

타인을 모욕하거나 괴롭히는 등 평화롭지 못한 목적으로 이용하지 마세요. 반달리즘, 트랜스포빅, 사칭 등이 여기에 포함됩니다.

다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 내용은 CW/NSFW 표시를 꼭 해주세요. 
예시로는: 고어물, 과도한 성적 묘사, 잔혹한 묘사, 과도한 빛의 반짝임 등이 있습니다.
사전에 승낙을 득 하지 않은 상업적 광고는 스팸으로 간주합니다. 사전 승낙은 @kurry 로 Direct 툿 부탁드립니다.
성소수자 혐오/나치/인종차별 등은 절대로 허용되지 않습니다.

"이상한 짓"을 하지 말아주세요!
(다음 것들이 포함 - 그러나 국한되지 않은)되어 있습니다: 의도적인 분쟁 유발, 다른 커뮤니티의 논쟁을 끌고 오는 것 등등
실사 NSFW 등(한국 법에 위배되는 경우)은 이 서버에서 이용하실 수 없습니다.
특정 문화를 강요하거나, 행동을 강요하지 마세요. 단, 서버 규칙 및 기타 관련 법규는 준수하셔야 합니다.
본 서버는 “퍼리 특화” 서버입니다. (5531) 서버를 제대로 들어왔는지 확인해 주신 후 가입 절차를 진행해 주세요.
가입 사유 작성란 시작 부분에, 규칙 안에 숨어 있는 4자리 숫자 코드를 입력해주세요. 이 코드는 논퍼리들이 규칙을 읽고 가입에 동의하였음을 증명하기 위한 코드로 사용되며, 가입 사유로 퍼리임을 확인할 수 없고 코드가 없는 경우 가입이 거부됩니다.

title: Mastodon - Augsburg.social
short_description: Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg ins Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.
description:
Augsburg.Social im Fediverse


Hier ist alles kostenlos und ohne Werbung! Hier stecken keine Konzerne dahinter die sich an Deinen Daten bereichern wollen!

Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg in's Fediverse finden kannst.
Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollständige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer Löschung von Toots und zu einer Blockierung von Accounts führen können, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

Belästigung, Stalking, Doxxing
Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Befürwortung
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Befürwortung
Gewalttätige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder Förderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder übermäßige Werbung
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Alle Nachrichten die über diesen Dienst verschickt werden, dürfen weder gegen geltendes deutsches noch internationales Recht verstoßen.
Dieser Dienst dient nicht zur Verbreitung von Inhalten, Dateien und/oder Angeboten, die gegen deutsches und/oder internationales Recht verstoßen.
Das Versenden von Werbung oder gleich welcher Art über diesen Dienst ist untersagt.
Die Verbreitung und/oder Unterstützung rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, antidemokratischer, unmenschlicher, homophober oder extremistischer Inhalte sind untersagt.
Verstöße gegen die Nutzungsbedingungen führen zum Ausschluss (Löschung des Kontos).

Bitte melde Verhalten, das dich stört an admin@augsburg.social. Das schließt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit anderen Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social, verfügbar in deren Github-Repository.

Augsburg.Social wird rein privat in der Freizeit betrieben.
Wir erwirken keinerlei Einnahmen und Gewinn mit dem Angebot und finanzieren es aus eigener Hand.
Dadurch behalten wir uns natürlich vor die angebotenen Dienste jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gründen einzuschränken oder zur Not ganz abzuschalten.
Wir werden uns jedoch bemühen Euch frühzeitig zu informieren falls soetwas eintreten sollte.

Falls ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt wendet Euch gern direkt auf Mastodon an @AnID@augsburg.social oder per E-Mail an admin@augsburg.social


Der Betrieb kostet viel Geld und Zeit. Strom und Hardwarekosten sind nicht gerade wenig... Wenn Ihr mich und diesen Dienst unterstützen wollt dann könnt Ihr sehr gerne etwas spenden um beizutragen, dass dieser Dienst auch noch lange online bleibt.

contact_account.note:
Sysadmin┃System Ingenier ┃Electrical engineer ┃ Nerd ┃ Let me, I can do it ┃ Love plants and animals ┃ Father and husband ┃ Admin of augsburg.social ┃ You never stop learning ┃ Unique is much better than perfet ┃ I think more than I say ┃ Mostly I don't mean it badly ┃ I am decent, the BKA does not have to send me Trojans

#Technik #Engineering #Linux #nobot

rules.text:
Dieser Server wird kostenfrei zur Verfügung gestellt. 
Er wird privat betrieben gehostet und finanziert.
Es besteht deswegen auch kein Anspruch auf Funktionalität, Ausfallsicherheit oder Fortführung des Dienstes.
Es besteht keine Garantie auf Accounts, Nachrichten oder Datenverlust.

Das Internet ist kein rechtsfreier Raum.  Alle Nachrichten die über diesen Dienst verschickt werden, dürfen weder gegen geltendes deutsches noch internationales Recht verstoßen. Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.

Veröffentliche kein Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die veröffentlichten Inhalte keinen persönlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Accounts werden automatisch und ohne Vorwarnung gelöscht, sollte innerhalb von 12 Monaten kein Login erfolgen.

Die Verbreitung und/oder Unterstützung rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, antidemokratischer, unmenschlicher, homophober oder extremistischer Inhalte sind untersagt.
Verstöße gegen die Nutzungsbedingungen führen zum sofortigen Ausschluss (sofortige Löschung des Kontos).
Keine Belästigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen Usern auf dieser Instanz bzw. im gesamten Fediverse.
Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten sind verboten.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden sofort gelöscht.
Du bist für deine Privatsphäre selbst verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet über dich steht, veröffentliche es nicht.

Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen Äußerungen. Achte auf einen respektvollen Umgang und faire Diskussionskultur. Benimm Dich so, als könnten wir uns morgen wieder persönlich auf der Straße begegnen.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen und Verschwörungstheorien sind hier UNerwünscht.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen bei sensitiven, kontroversen, oder vermutlich triggernden Themen.
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte.

rules.text: Esta es una red federada. Aquí no es bienvenido ni el racismo, ni la LGTBIfobia, ni el machismo, ni ningún tipo de discriminación. Cualquier perfil relacionado con esos términos será borrado automáticamente. Se permiten los joseos entre miembros de esta estancia, respeta a quien no le gusten.
No aceptamos discursos de ultra derecha ni ningún tipo de contenido relacionado
El idioma general de esta instancia es Español, pero eres libre de escribir en gallego, catalán o euskera.
Cualquier contenido gráfico para adultos debe ser tipificado como tal. Por favor no abuses del mismo, es una instancia generalista
No está permitido el abuso, acoso, o persecución a otras cuentas. Esto no es Twitter.
No aceptamos contenido ilegal, ni vulneraciones de copyright. Estas en Mastodon, usa recursos copyleft
Las cuentas inactivas durante 3 meses se borrarán automáticamente del servidor.
Nos reservamos el derecho de ampliar estas normas o moderar cuentas, igualmente creemos que si alguien te molesta eres libre de bloquear
Somos una instancia federada, por favor respeta a los usuarios de otras instancias
No aceptamos teorías conspiranoicas (antivacunas, covid, que la tierra es plana...)
No aceptamos bots, hay instancias para alojarlos
No aceptamos simbología franquista, nazi, fascistas, racistas, sexistas o discriminatorios en general.
No se permiten imágenes gore ni excesivamente violentas.
No se permite incitación al terrorismo, violencia o cualquier tipo de conducta agresiva
Las cuentas con contenidos ilegales serán reportadas a las autoridades pertinentes.
Todos los comentarios son personales. Las textos y opiniones escritos son responsabilidad del autor. Esta instancia, sus administradores y moderadores no avalan ninguna de las opiniones publicadas.
Instancia para mayores de 18 años y/o mayoría de edad legal.

rules.text:
Be a good human!         

Help to make the atmosphere as welcoming and enjoyable as possible for everyone.

18 Years and Over Only!           

You must be 18 years or older to join the Apobangpo.space server. Minors are not allowed.

Community Charter:                          

Read the community charter, which you can find at: https://apobangpo.website/server-rules/

No Hate:                                          

Racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, ageism, ableism, religious intolerance and other forms of disrespect or aggression are unacceptable.

No Impersonations:      

Please do not create usernames that are direct impersonations of BTS Members or any other individual. eg. Exact celebrity names or the username of well-known bird app accounts that don't belong to you.

Keep Safe:                  

Do practice online safety strategies when using Apobangpo.Space. Do not share personal or private information in public messages or DMs.

No Large Files:                                  
You are welcome upload images, gifs and videos up to 20MB. Please avoid uploading larger files in your Toots. Instead, save them to free storage tool (Google Drive, DropBox, Youtube, Vimeo for example) and link to them.

title: Toot.Garden
short_description: A server for art, gaming, and musings about the world, with the occasional meme and lighthearted joke. Running for 1.5+ years, dedicated to providing you a place to be social without being the product
description:
Toot.Garden is a Mastodon server that is meant for the casual gamers, artists, and those with creative minds. Many casual games such as Celeste, Stardew Valley, Minecraft, and more- promote creativity, and oftentimes like minds attract each other. Whether you are an artist, computer programmer, game designer, or anything else, you should feel at home here. This should be your place to grow, connect, and share! That's the goal anyway!

The beauty of Mastodon is it allows for server owners, and their communities to moderate and curate content as they wish. This server is not a place for racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, or alt-right thinking/discourse. Should activities, posting, or otherwise be infringing upon this, a swift ban will be placed upon the infringing account.

rules.text: We do not permit NSFW or NSFL content to be posted on this server whatsoever, this ranges from excessively NSFW messages and imagery to NSFL content such as extreme gore. There are other servers where that can be posted.
Never share any personally identifiable information about yourself or others, such as addresses, school, etc. this is for the safety of you and others.
The incitement or promotion of violence and or violent ideologies is not permitted here.
It should go without saying, but- racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, and antisemitism is not permitted, and is not tolerated. We are all people, let's treat each other as such.

Listen to others, if you’re accused of causing harm, or making someone uncomfortable, take a step back, recognize that the other person may see things differently, and take responsibility for your actions. If you need an intermediary, please contact the moderation team.
Use the report feature before getting into arguments, or causing conflict. Our moderation team is here to assist and take care of these things.

Automated account reposting from sites such as Twitter (X), Facebook, Reddit, etc. is not allowed unless you have first contacted alienknight@toot.garden, this is to prevent spam, and potential abuse. Upon approval, your account will have a badge applied to it that will help prevent reports.

Civil political discussion is fine, but mark it with a CW for those who may wish to avoid it. Please be mindful of global conflicts, and make educated choices on posts that may make light of situations that are very real for others. Reports about such content may lead to said posts being removed.

rules.text: First and most important rules: Don't be excessively annoying. Don't get annoyed too easily

We want this to be a harassment-free environment, regardless of gender, gender identity, age, sexual orientation, disability or whatever other personal situation. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate.

Of course, we can also socialize and talk about other topics, and it's ok. But if you plan to use mastodon ONLY for other topics, there are a lot of better servers for you out there.

Community members are free to express themselves openly and give constructive criticism and feedback

rules.text:
Protect the Vulnerable:
In case of user conflicts or rules misinterpreted as harmful, admins prioritize the vulnerable to prevent/minimize harm.
No Bigotry: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, casteism, classism.
Alt-text is Required: Alt-text is mandatory for images. Follow @PleaseCaption@botsin.space bot for reminders
No Harassment or Doxxing: Content promoting/supporting harassment, dogpiling, or doxxing is prohibited.
NSFW Content Warning: ALL NSFW content must have a CW. Unsure? Use a CW.
No Illegal Content: Don't post content illegal under US law. If unsure, don't post.
No Spam/Advertising: Includes unsolicited messages, pyramid schemes, cryptocurrency, etc. Reasonable self-promotion of creative work allowed.
No Business Accounts: Exceptional businesses must contact admins and fund the infrastructure for 1 year if accepted.
No Incitement of Violence: Promoting/supporting violence against any group/individual prohibited. Unsure? Don't post.
Bot Rules: Bots must be marked, follow rules, and not strain resources. Non-compliant bots will be suspended, then removed if not fixed.

rules.text:
Themes & discussions @free-solutions.org
-Les logiciels LIBRES, la souveraineté numérique...
-La technologie webRTC & communications realtime chat, audio, vidéo
-Sujets Suisses
-Ecologie & notre planète

Bienvenus en Helvétie,
La devise du pays c'est "Un pour tous, tous pour un"
Ici vous êtes responsables dans cette communauté vis à vis du collectif de signaler tout comportement incorrect ou abusif d'un utilisateur.

Aucun comportement ni contenu illégal en Suisse. MERCI !
Tout ce qui est interdit comme comportement et publications sur les autres grands réseaux sociaux l'est ici aussi.
Compromis, bienveillance, dialogue et travail collaboratif dans le respect des croyances et opinions de chacun. Chaque voix compte et peut s'exprimer librement dans le respect et la cordialité.

Toute personne violente, agressive, raciste et qui ne respecte pas l'harmonie de la communauté sera immédiatement sanctionné. Après un avertissement cordial, la suppression immédiate du compte sera la règle.

Ce service est mis à disposition gracieusement par Free-Solutions Sàrl Il nous sert à tester des solutions que nous proposons à nos clients. Votre utilisation permet aussi de corriger des bugs dans le code source des projets Libres comme igniterealtime.org
Free-Solutions OS - Sont les bienvenus et prioritaires tous les utilisateurs de Free-Solutions OS

rules.text: Diskriminierung und Bigotterie werden bei uns nicht toleriert! Meinungsfreiheit ja, aber nicht auf dem Rücken von Menschen die Hilfe nötig haben. Wir sind nicht an Nazis, TERFS, FARTs oder Hassreden interessiert.

Einverständnis ist in jedem Zusammenhang wichtig. Wenn du dir jemals unsicher bist, frage zuerst. Verwende bei Bedarf Triggerwarnungen (TW/CW).

rules.text: Be kind. Insulting or bullying other members or non-members will get you banned from the group without prior warning.
Be civil. We do not condone foul language. Breaking this rule once will land you a warning. Doing it repeatedly will get you banned.

Promotion of your own creative endeavors, and of nonprofit organizations, is acceptable. But other advertising should be avoided. Inappropriate posts will be immediately removed and you might get banned.
Use the search option. To avoid cluttering the group, please search the feed before asking a question. Someone might have already asked the same thing before.
English preferred, please. To make sure all members of the group understand you, please use the English language. Links to posts in other languages are OK.
Stick to the topic. We only allow posts and comments related to the group’s activity. Off-topic content will be removed and you will get a warning.
No spamming. Asking the same question or posting the same comment repeatedly after it has been removed by admins due to rule violation will result in a ban.
Report rule-breaking. If you see a post/comment that violates our rules, report it to the admins — DO NOT verbally attack the author of said post/comment.
Think before you report. Don’t report posts or comments that aren’t breaking any rules just because you don’t like or agree with their content.
Talk to the admin team. If you have any questions or concerns or are experiencing issues in the group, please turn to one of the admins for help. That’s what we’re here for!
